VanMoof is looking for an ultra bright analyst who s ready to take the next step in their career and become a data superstar in our operations team  You ll be responsible for providing data driven insights and understanding the inner workings of our operation  Are you excited about working with data and don t shy away from new challenges  This is your chance to become part of VanMoof s ever growing international operations team  As an Operations Data Analyst  you ll create clear and effective analyses via dashboards  reports  and ad hoc cases  You ll support the Operations team in all relevant projects and aid data driven decision making  As the Operations team affects all aspects of the organization  it s vital to transform the information we work with into easily digestible resources for teams and management to rely on  The insight gathered from your work will be shared with Amsterdam based teams including customer support  retail  digital  and finance  as well as international team members in Taiwan and the USA   so your communication skills need to be on point  You ll report to the Global Operations Planning and Analytics Lead and work closely with the other members of the Ops team  You will help keep the operations ship on course and surface new opportunities by identifying areas of improvement  What you ll bring Degree in Mathematics  Sciences  Supply Chain  Engineering  or similar field  2 4 years of relevant experience Advanced SQL and Excel Google Sheet skills High quality visual presentation skills Experience with creating and monitoring KPIs Wat ga je doen Heb jij een wo master in een beta studie en heb je affiniteit met data  Kickstart je data science carrière bij Detailresult Groep  Een  retail  wereld waarin de hoeveelheid data exponentieel toeneemt  waarin technologische innovaties elkaar in rap tempo opvolgen  waarin markten transparanter worden en klantbehoeften veranderen  brengt volop kansen en nieuwe uitdagingen met zich mee  Als Junior Data Scientist ben je onderdeel van het Advanced Analytics team en word jij in een zesweekse fulltime Data Science bootcamp klaargestoomd om impact te maken in de Food Retail  In ons kantoor in Amsterdam wordt er dankzij jou geen beslissing meer genomen op buikgevoel  maar op basis van analyse en feiten  Met jouw vernieuwende inzichten geef je input voor actuele vraagstukken die spelen bij Dirk en DekaMarkt  Welke voorraden zijn er binnen onze ruim 225 filialen nodig voor de komende Paasacties  Hoe passen we het assortiment perfect aan op het verzorgingsgebied per filiaal  En hoe optimaliseren we het pickproces in onze distributiecentra  Je werkzaamheden zijn hierin veelzijdig  je bent in het gehele proces betrokken en zorgt zo dat er een volledige end to end oplossing staat  Naast je modeleer  en programmeer werk doe je intakes  stem je af met de business  denk je na over de implementatie en zorg je samen met IT voor een geautomatiseerde output  Vanwege de grote verscheidenheid aan vraagstukken werk je samen met meerdere business units  van Commercie tot Logistiek en van Digital tot Marketing  Detailresult Groep is een organisatie met aanpakkers  jouw aanbevelingen zal je veelal direct in de praktijk zien  Een gemiddelde werkdag ziet er ongeveer als volgt uit Tijd en activiteit 9 00  9 30 Stand up met data science project team 9 30  11 00 Programmeren  SQL  Python  R  11 00  11 30 Telefonische afstemming met IT over live zetten van model 12 00  13 00 Lunch 13 00 14 00 Project meeting met business 14 00 15 00 Conceptueel modeleringsplan opstellen rondom het whiteboard samen met andere Data Scientisten 15 00 17 00 Modeleringsplan uitwerken in code  SQL  Python  R  17 00 17 30 Mail bijwerken Wat wij je bieden We stomen je klaar door middel van een zesweekse bootcamp tot een volwaardige Data Scientist professional  Hierna start je een interessante en uitdagende baan binnen de afdeling Advanced Analytics  Dit team is jong  compact  ambitieus en leergierig en sinds 2017 binnen Detailresult Groep gestart  Je werkt samen met je directe collega s maar ook met externe partijen die leading zijn binnen de wereld van Big Data en AI  Uiteraard zijn de randvoorwaarden goed geregeld  je krijgt een iPhone en laptop van de zaak  Er staat een groot Data Warehouse klaar met enorm grote datasets  dankzij een rijke historie  We bieden je een omgeving waarin kansen en mogelijkheden te over zijn  Alles staat klaar  we missen alleen jou nog  Om jou hierin een vlammende start te geven  investeren wij in je persoonlijke én professionele ontwikkeling  Daarnaast ontvang je goede primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  zoals  Afhankelijk van ervaring een  start salaris tussen de  37 575   en  53 678   bruto per jaar inclusief Freshheads zoekt een data analist  Word jij warm van cijfers en digitale innovatie  En weet jij met de juiste technische snufjes gouden groeikansen te spotten in een grote berg data  Dan word jij vast blij van deze functie Wat ga jij doen Steek die handen maar uit de mouwen  want als data analist bij Freshheads heb je een uiteenlopende functie waarbij je niet alleen bezig bent met data analyse  maar ook betrokken bent bij andere stappen binnen innovatie  en groeiprojecten  Samen met collega s start je met het ontdekken van de groeikansen voor de producten  website  app of campagne van een klant  Wanneer jullie samen een geschikte strategie hebben bepaald richt jij je op het implementeren van de juiste data analysetools  Dankzij jouw kennis over programmeertalen zorg jij ervoor dat jullie geen data mislopen Jouw liefde voor cijfers komt optimaal tot uiting wanneer je de data gaat analyseren  Jij ziet meteen waar kansen en pijnpunten liggen  Aan de hand van een visualisatie van de data in een dashboard leg je aan je team en de klant uit waar ze staan ten opzichte van hun doelen  Daarbij kom je met concrete voorbeelden  bedenk je relevante acties en of kom je proactief met verbetervoorstellen Bij Freshheads zijn acht teams iedere dag bezig met het realiseren van relevante digitale producten en diensten  Op dit moment zijn we op zoek naar een data analist die alle teams gaat helpen bij datavraagstukken van diverse klanten Met wie ga je dit doen Als nieuwe data analist sta je er natuurlijk niet alleen voor  Jij wordt de compagnon van data analist Nienke  Naast tennis en Nick   Simon is Nienke dol op cijfers  al helemaal op oplopende cijfers  Bijna 4 jaar geleden begon ze dan ook als eerste data analist bij Freshheads  Daardoor kan ze jou alle fijne kneepjes van het vak aanleren  Ze heeft de functie tenslotte zelf vorm mogen geven  Ook jouw input is daarin welkom  Samen verdelen jullie het werk voor onze klanten en helpen jullie elkaar waar nodig ConcreetHerken jij jezelf in onderstaande punten  En nog belangrijker  word je er blij van Je kent het volledige proces van data analyse Het implementeren van analysetools  zoals Google Analytics Data Studio  Firebase en Hotjar  is appeltje eitje voor jou  Ook weet jij alles van Tag Management systemen Pre  je hebt affiniteit met technische aspecten van digitale applicaties Zo kun je goed uit de voeten met SQL  En R of Python zijn mooi meegenomen  maar geen must  Helder communiceren en adviseren gaat je goed af  Je weet inzichten uit data op de juiste manier te verwoorden en klanten en collega s te overtuigen van jouw bevindingen Flexibiliteit is een must have  Je kunt snel schakelen tussen verschillende projecten en werkt gemakkelijk samen met verschillende teams  Ondertussen raak jij het overzicht niet kwijt Na je opleiding heb je minimaal 1 jaar werkervaring opgedaan op het gebied van data analyse en je hebt zin om hier nog meer over te leren Je toont graag initiatief  wanneer jij het idee hebt dat collega s een doel op een andere manier efficiënter kunnen bereiken  deel je jouw tips met hen Freshheads biedt  Een functie in schaal C  Vraag hiervoor naar ons job_desc: Would you like to put your data analytics experience to use in an independent and responsible role at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions for stakeholders Liaising with external clients who request data or reporting solutions Communicating with business stakeholders to understand key metrics  analyse business and technical requirements then develop reporting   data applications Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field Minimum 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within an analytics teams Minimum 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces An interesting industry  marketplaces are booming  therefore our company is thriving This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting challenges   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools  We re currently migrating to Azure Personal and professional development within a fast growing company with international plans and ambitions Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Are you up for the challenge  Don t hesitate to send us your application today Job Type  Full time

Job description Would you like to work on shaping tomorrow s world  Contribute to groundbreaking innovations and developments in technological knowledge  Are you a team player who feels at home in an international and interdisciplinary environment  Then we are looking for you  Eindhoven University of Technology  TU e  is an internationally oriented research university  specializing in engineering  science   technology and is known for its large scientific impact and its role in developing technological innovations  TU e is a university at the center of society and sets its focus on complex social challenges by concentrating its education and research on three Strategic Areas  Energy  Health and Smart Mobility  An ambitious university requires dedicated support to our scientists  the support service Data Management   Library  DML  plays a key role at TU e within the fields of Research Data Management  RDM   General Data Management and Open Science  Furthermore  DML comprises the University library and archives  and provides information skills training to bachelor  master and PhD students  The DML staff totals 50 employees  Job description We are looking for a research data management specialist  data steward  with an enterprising and customer oriented attitude  who will shape RDM support to the university s researchers  You will support researchers in addressing internal and external requirements with regards to RDM  applying FAIR principles to research data  and so contribute to reuse and reproducibility of research  Your work will cover a broad scope of topics  which vary from assistance in RDM planning  advice on storage  archiving and publication of research data  handling privacy sensitive data  policy making  to providing and developing training in RDM skills  You will serve as first line of support for privacy related matters  working closely with the Privacy team and performing the first assessment of the privacy compliance in research projects  Besides  you will contribute to the further development of data stewardship within TU e  You report to the Head of Research Data Management and closely cooperate with colleague data stewards  DML   colleagues from Information   Management Services  IMS  and other services  You will Support and advise researchers on RDM related issues such as for example  Preparing and implementing Data Management Plans  DMP   Drafting data paragraphs for grant proposals  Storing  publishing and archiving research data  Preparing their submissions for Ethical Review Board approval  Handling privacy sensitive data in compliance with legal requirements and institutionalpolicies and guidelines Applying FAIR priniciples to research data  Fullfilling financial and legal requirements concerning research data  Support and advise researchers on privacy related issues such as for example  Drafting informed consent and privacy notices  Evaluating privacy roles within research collaborations and consortia and identifying the needed agreements and documents  Identifying and assessing privacy and legal risks  including copyright and licensing  during the entire research lifecycle  Preparing Data Protection Impact Assessments  DPIA  in collaboration with the Privacy team  Contribute to the development of data stewardship and RDM services at TU e  Raise awareness on RDM and handling privacy senstive data among researchers  Develop and provide trainings on RDM and privacy GDPR compliance  Establish a functional and appropriate services supply chain for researchers in coordination with colleagues  Job requirements You are expected to have the following qualifications and characteristics  An academic level of work and thinking  preferably a completed Master or PhD in the technical or medical sciences  and an affinity with research practice  Proactive and result oriented attitude and gain energy from pioneering and collaborating within a relatively new field of work in support of scientific research  Ability to easily assimilate knowledge and not afraid to learn on the job  Skilled in transferring and sharing knowledge to staff  students  junior researchers and senior researchers  Ability to connect and translate various requirements  i e   legal  policy and technical  into solutions and best practices with regards to research data management and data stewardship  Customer oriented and supportive way of working  gain energy from supporting and solving issues for others  Networking skills and feel comfortable with connecting people and building networks  Excellent communication and negotiating skills and can be authoritative when the situation requires it  You are have excellent English language skills  both orally and in writing  Proficiency in the Dutch language is not a requirement  but it is an advantage  Preferably you have  Experience in handling privacy sensitive data and knowledge of GDPR  and or willingness to develop yourself further in this field  Experience or a demonstrable affinity with research data management and data stewardship within higher education or a research institution  Knowledge which will contribute to applying FAIR principles to research data  e g  on metadata  standards   Conditions of employment You will be appointed for a one year period  Appointment via Euflex  the TU e secondment organization  will be considered  If performance is good  this appointment may be made permanent  Full time gross salary  depending on research experience  competences and educational background  will be a minimum of   2 968   and a maximum of   5 211    salary scale 9 11 CAO NU and UFO profile Specialist Scientific Information 2   The year end allowance is 8 3  of the annual salary  corresponding to a monthly salary   The holiday allowance is 8  of the annual salary  In addition  TU e offers excellent secondary conditions of employment  e g   a minimum of 41 days of leave based on a 40 hour working week and excellent sports facilities  flexible working hours  an excellent pension scheme via the ABP    Information and application For information please contact  Marijella van der Klugt    31 40 2476345 Linde Keverkamp    31 40 2476303

About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the role  We re accepting these challenges by applying data  algorithms and machine learning to problems in logistics  routes  personalization  search  pricing  experimentation and more  Our Data team is at the heart of this effort and is an essential ingredient in Beat s aggressive growth plan and vision for the future   As a Data Analyst in Pricing  you will take on some of our biggest marketplace challenges such as optimising dynamic pricing models  discovering opportunities for new product features  understanding price elasticity  or evaluating the impact of product changes on our passengers and drivers  Your work will impact the entire marketplace  so you ll have the opportunity to make an immediate difference  Your day to day will involve close collaboration with stakeholders across product  operations  machine learning  data engineering  and technology   What you ll do day in day out  Contribute to solving challenging two sided marketplace problems using data solutions  Understand user behavior with regards to pricing and help shape our pricing strategy  Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps  Design and implement frameworks to measure price elasticity of passengers at scale  Evaluate price changes in a controlled manner  either via offline or online experiments  Work together with the product and analytics teams to identify and deliver high impact product improvements and optimizations  Keep yourself updated with advances in the fields related to ride hailing and micro mobility  Work closely with other data members of the team  build a strong data driven culture in the domain and ensure that we have the right knowledge and tools to solve problems  What you need to have  Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience  At least 3 years of hands on experience in analytics in a fast paced environment  Knowledge of SQL  Python R  and data visualisation tools such as Tableau  Exemplary communication skills  ability to work with cross functional teams  including technical and non technical team members  Strong commercial awareness  ability to clarify ambiguity and balance priorities  Interest in experimentation  designing experiments  and using causal inference methods to draw conclusions  Deep belief in data and ability to rally people behind your findings recommendations  Nice to have  Experience with pricing analytics  What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

genomen hebben  Wil je in de zorg werken in regio Utrecht om analytische oplossingen te maken in programmeertalen zoals Python  R of SQL  Dan is de rol van Data Scientist bij Mediq iets voor jou  Wat ga je doen  Door het strategisch modelleren van data ontdek je de nieuwe ontwikkelingen  voorspel je de toekomst en help je de business hierop in te spelen  Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor de inzet van nieuwe datasets en technieken  zoals machine learning en artificial intelligence  Als Data Scientist ben je verantwoordelijk voor  Verzamelen  beoordelen en prepareren van data sets  Ontwerpen  ontwikkelen  testen  inzetten en beheren van statistische voorspellingen en voorspellende modellen Verbeteren van de klantbediening en of commerciële klant markt benadering zowel effectief als efficiënt Visualisatie van data inzichten Beantwoorden van vervolgvragen over de werking en validatie van het resultaat Vastleggen van de achtergrondinformatie en zorgen voor in beheer name zodat later de voorspelling verder ontwikkeld kan worden Geven van trainingen en technisch inhoudelijke ondersteuning Voorstellen van wijzigingen voor de klant  en marktbenadering en dienstverlening door de toepassingen van nieuwe datatechnieken  Denk aan machine learning en artificial intelligence Onderzoeken wat de trends en ontwikkelingen zijn in de markt op het gebied van nieuwe datatechnieken Wat breng je mee  Master titel en beschikt over uitmuntende analytische skills Kennis van en ervaring met econometrische modelleertechnieken  data mining algoritmes  optimization technieken en statistiek Je bent een teamplayer  sociaal vaardig en kan goed omgaan met diverse stakeholders Je bent zeer bedreven in programmeertalen  zoals Python  R en SQL  waarbij ervaring met Python een pré is Ervaring met projectmanagement en cross functioneel samenwerken Goede communicatieve vaardigheden in het Engels en Nederlands en bent in staat om samen in overleg naar een werkbare toepassing op basis van data overheid en verzekeraars  Dagelijks worden vanuit Utrecht duizenden klanten geholpen en geïnformeerd  Met de grote afdeling Klantcontact is Utrecht het kloppend hart van onze organisatie  Utrecht is ook het  internationale  hoofdkantoor van Mediq  Hier vind je de groepsdirectie van Mediq en internationale stafafdelingen  waaronder bijvoorbeeld finance en IT  Tot slot vind je in Utrecht de waar alles bij elkaar komt  Je maakt hier kennis met ongeveer 500 verschillende medewerkers én alle aspecten van onze business  IT   Digital Global IT ondersteunt in alle landen waar Mediq actief is  en bestaat uit drie afdelingen  Het Digitale team  bestaande uit vier scrum teams die portalen en e Health oplossingen ontwikkelen voor honderdduizenden patiënten en zorg professionals  Productowners  Interne IT specialisten en een grote groep ontwikkelaars werken in sprints om de diverse oplossingen steeds iets beter te krijgen  Daarnaast is er een IT Applications Backoffice team  bestaande uit 20  Senior  SAP professionals  aangevuld met offshore en lokale consultants  Mediq staat de komende jaren voor uitdagende veranderingen in de zorg en uiteindelijk  en dit team moet zorgdragen voor job_desc: About Apeiron Insight Apeiron Insight is a data driven research   analytics company  providing insights   data products to investment companies for them to make better informed  investment  decisions  The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise  We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling   Machine Learning  Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines  Your role at Apeiron Insight We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors  You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research  The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models  perform data analysis  write reports  update marketing materials  and service client requests  The individual should be proficient with Excel  mathematical modeling  and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting  Experience with Python  SQL  or R is highly preferred  The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator  Additionally  the candidate must be self motivated  detail oriented  and a creative thinker who has interest   curiosity in the intersection of  alternative data   investment research  and financial markets  Responsibilities Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector  Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights  Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources  including  but not limited to  proprietary datasets  company documents and materials  SEC regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks  industry publications  and online data services  Write  edit  and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models  Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy  Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests  Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases  What are we looking for  Functional understanding of data analysis using Python  SQL or R is a must  Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners  Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business industry trends based on use of alternative data  Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data  Self starter who works well in a fast paced environment  Team player  happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering   the Management team  You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English  verbally and in writing   Command of the Dutch language is a plus  Enjoy working in a cool   stylish office  overlooking the Hague  with excellent facilities  We also really appreciate  Strong mathematical and statistical background  An intuitive understanding of business problems  What to expect  We believe in commitment  your permanent contract will be waiting for you  Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities   experience  Bonus scheme  8  holiday payment  25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week  Personal education study budget  An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best  Based in Rijswijk  of course in  hybrid mode   working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work  If you think this position fits you well  we sincerely hope to hear from you  If so  please submit your resume and motivation letter

Job Title Data Designer Job Description In this role  you have the opportunity to Unleash the power of design  data and AI to deliver value to people when it matters most  caring for their health  Work in a highly talented team  shape the data and AI design capability  work on exciting challenges in healthcare domain  You will bring the Data Design competence to the next level by leveraging data as design material in the creative process and impact people s health through meaningful data and AI enabled propositions  With your hands on design and programming skills  you bring in a new view on and build exciting new propositions for our users and customers through visualizing and synthesizing on data  We are looking for a Data Design expert that can run projects in the team with high level of independence  This role can be for a computer or data scientist with clear experience in a creative  design environment  able to provide portfolio proving affinity with the design field  On the other hand  this role can be for a UX designer with clear affinity with data  who is able to work hands on with data and program oneself  You are responsible for Building differentiating propositions encompassing data and AI that are relevant to our end users in the healthcare domain Gather  structure  visualize to translate data into insights Support other designers in embedding data and AI into their design practice Bridge the design capabilities with data science AI capabilities Building a toolset and repeatable way of working for data enabled design You are a part of The Data Enabled Design team  a group of data designers with expertise on data visualization  user experience research and prototyping with around data and AI  The Data Enabled Design team is part of global 400  design community and working on both business and research driven projects  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience University degree  WO HBO  in Design or Computer Science  or related  Hands on programming skills  e g  React  NodeJS  D3  Experience in creating strong design concepts Knowledge and experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence is a pre Independently act in both innovation projects as business projects English verbal and writing In return  we offer you A path towards your most rewarding career  Succeeding in this role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career  in other areas in Philips or otherwise  We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person  Thus  we offer competitive health benefits  a flexible work schedule and access to local well being focused activities  Why should you join Philips  Working at Philips is more than a job  It s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work  focused on improving 2 5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum  Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways  Learn more by watching this video  To find out more about what it s like working for Philips at a personal level  visit the Working at Philips page on our career website  where you can read stories from our employee blog  Once there you can also learn about our recruitment process  or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions   LI EU

Full time   Amsterdam Hi  we are Mollie        Our mission is creating a greater playing field for everyone  By offering convenient  safe and worldwide payment solutions we remove barriers for companies of all sizes to compete on equal terms  Your opportunity  As Mollie s VP of Data you are responsible for evolving our data platform  tools  and mindset  This is an exceptional leadership opportunity where you will lead in defining our vision and strategy for data  covering topics like the technologies that power our data lakes  analytics  machine learning  while curating the quality and governance of our data  The role reports directly to Mollie s CTO and plays a key part in shaping Mollie s technology strategy and roadmap   You manage and grow the teams that build and improve our data platform  that in turn powers the business  This platform enables the different departments and product engineering teams throughout the business to unleash the power of data for decision making  by building capabilities such as AB testing   and create opportunities to use data to build products  Our usual customers are small and medium sized businesses  and we see a lot of opportunity to improve our product and processes through the use of data   In addition to managing the teams that build the data platform  you work with people across the business to educate  explore opportunities to use data in a way that advances Mollie s ambitions   What you ll be doing Own the topic of data at Mollie by clearly defining what success looks like  set ambitious goals and make sure you drive progress against those   Setting the long term vision and strategy for Mollie s data domain  You ll be the driving force behind the development and success of this key area  Bring our data platform to the next level  enabling easy access to machine learning for product teams  and better tools for the business  Inspire and lead a team of data scientists  data engineers and analysts  create processes and structures that drive career progression and collaboration  Scale and grow your teams with an eye on diverse skills that cover machine learning  analytics and engineering  and other skills needed to achieve the objectives  Foster and maintain Mollie s inclusive culture that is both collaborative and passionate  where creativity and engagement are highly valued  You are a trusted advisor and thought leader to the executive leadership team  Ensure each organisation gets the analytical support they need and contribute to the company strategy through high level insights and communications  You will own the development  engagement and performance of our data visualisation stack  Right now we are using Looker but we are always looking for ways to improve  Meet the data team Isabelle  Head of Data Edward Lead Analyst Ana  Data Scientist Engineer Willem  Data Science Lead

job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way reizigers vertrouwen op onze technologie  Veerle   Ik ervaar team EDM als een hecht team met collega s die betrokken zijn en elkaar de tijd en ruimte geven om te ontwikkelen   Goed om te weten  Het betreft een Participatiebaan  specifiek voor de doelgroep met een arbeidsbeperking  zoals beschreven in de Wet banenafspraak  o a  Wajong  Participatiewet   Indien je niet geregistreerd staat in het Doelgroepenregister is het niet mogelijk om te solliciteren naar deze functie  Thuiswerken als op kantoor behoort tot de mogelijkheden  Je zult te maken hebben met omgevingsgeluid en meerdere personen in een ruimte  kantoortuin   Fijn als je hier goed mee weet om te gaan  In deze functie vinden wij het fijn dat je nauwkeurig kunt werken  Bij NS vinden we iedereen uniek  Dit zie je in alles wat we doen  en dus ook in ons aannamebeleid  Een achtergrondonderzoek maakt deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure Dit ga je doen als stamdatabeheerder Je maakt deel uit van een team binnen de afdeling Enterprise Data Management  wat onder Data  Innovatie   Analyse  DIA  valt  In dit team zijn ze verantwoordelijk voor het beheer van stamdata  zoals gegevens van leveranciers en klanten  Je werkt veel samen met collega s binnen je eigen team en ook daarbuiten  Je bent een schakel in het juist en tijdig uitvoeren van aanvragen die binnenkomen voor de mutaties van stamdata  Goed als je kritisch bent en dat je ook de gedeelde verantwoordelijkheid neemt voor de resultaten  Je teamgenoten rekenen op jouw ondersteuning  Daarnaast mooi als je feedback geeft zowel gevraagd als ongevraagd  en krijg jij feedback  dan zie je dat als een kans om te groeien  Fijn als je communicatief vaardig bent  flexibel kan zijn maar ook snel van begrip  En natuurlijk prettig als je goed kan omgaan met tijdsdruk  Dankzij jouw focus op resultaat en kwaliteitsbewustzijn ben jij van onschatbare waarde bij  Afhandelen van aanvragen voor mutaties van stamdata  Uitvoeren van periodieke en of project gerelateerde  monitorings en of  opschoningsacties van stamdata  Vertalen wensen van gebruikers naar registratie stamdata  Signalering en bespreekbaar maken van mogelijkheden voor verbetering stamdatabeheer  Afstemmen met ketenpartners  Zoals Finance en Procurement   over te volgen in te richten proces  Afstemmen met  IT  collega s over stamdatabeheer of userbeheer  Testen van IT applicaties met betrekking tot de stamdata  Hier ga je werken Op loopafstand van station Utrecht Centraal bundelen ruim 200 collega s van de afdeling Data  Innovatie   Analyse  DIA  hun krachten  Hier werkt een mix van ervaringen en persoonlijkheden  die elkaar graag opzoeken om met elkaar te sparren en kennis te delen  Kortom  we zoeken een collega die het fijn vindt om met verschillende mensen samen te werken  Je komt echter te werken in een team van 3 collega s die je op sleeptouw nemen  Je bent minimaal 24 tot 36 uur per week beschikbaar en de werkdagen en werklocatie  thuis of kantoor  bepalen we in overleg  Collega s omschrijven de cultuur op de afdeling als een prettige omgeving  waar men enthousiast  behulpzaam en flexibel alles oppakt met elkaar  Er komen verschillende culturen bij elkaar  jong en oud  wat een fijne sfeer oplevert  Begin 2020 is de NS strategie  Nederland duurzaam bereikbaar  Voor iedereen  gelanceerd  Belangrijke pijlers zijn het netwerk van de toekomst  stations als knooppunt van mobiliteit en leefbaarheid  flexibel en veelzijdig reizen met de NS app  Flexibel en veelzijdig reizen  betekent dat NS transformeert van treinbedrijf naar breed mobiliteitsbedrijf en stellen  of om zelfstandig aan te geven dat prioritering nodig is  of hulp te vragen daar waar nodig   Kennis van administratieve processen  Affiniteit met IT  Dit zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden Werken Your energy As an Energy Data Expert at System Operations  you work with multidisciplinary teams to create the electrical grid of the future  The energy transition presents Alliander with an enormous challenge  The increase in decentralised generation  increasing electricity consumption  the introduction of heat grids and new gases in a single integrated energy system  alongside the creation of the infrastructure and market facilitation to realise these energy flows  necessitate a fundamentally different approach to our processes and services  The team at System Operations works hard to deliver solutions that allow us to make smarter and more efficient use of our electrical grids for our customers  And that s where you come in  because you re the team s technical expert  Your daily work involves transforming innovative ideas for our customers into concrete solutions and processes  One example is a new grid structure that allows us to prevent and resolve congestion in the electrical grid  As an expert at System Operations  you are capable of thinking outside the box  You continuously develop new  technologically innovative solutions  Your environment You and your fellow experts are the technical core and the beating heart of a Scrum team that brings together expertise about energy technology  As a team  you have the space and autonomy to determine your own course as you design and realise the electrical grid of the future  while coordinating as necessary with your environment  In concrete terms  your work involves developing concepts and carrying out grid calculations to realise customer connections without making major capital investments  This is how you contribute to an affordable  reliable and stable electrical grid for today and tomorrow  You are part of one or more multidisciplinary teams that  assess and estimate the impact of customer applications  new customer propositions and technological innovations on our grids and systems  determine the conditions to allow new solutions to be implemented  implement  or arrange the implementation of  technological innovations and modifications within and beyond System Operations in consultation with stakeholders  At the front end  you ensure effective coordination with our end users and supply chain partners  You work with your fellow experts specialists  Scrum masters and product owners  You prepare and maintain user stories and prioritise these based on the backlog  Your employer We are Alliander  a group made up of various companies  including Liander  Qirion and Kenter  We develop and maintain the electrical grid for millions of users in the Netherlands  That s quite a challenge  especially as the energy transition is now in full swing  Thankfully  we can count on the knowledge and skills of our 7 000 professionals  Together  we devise and realise technically smart solutions to prepare our electrical grid for the future  We also try to minimise our carbon emissions while doing business sustainably  In this role  you will join the 7 000 employees of Liander  the grid operator  Together  they manage the daily distribution of gas and electricity through our grids  You share your expertise within the System Operations department  On the work floor  you ll find 15 multidisciplinary teams of 7 10 people who are young at heart and ambitious  Although the teams work hard  there s still time for a joke and a friendly pat on the shoulder  Thanks to the intensive teamwork  they are also very close  System Operations works in an Agile way to deliver the energy supply of the future  One example is the spike app  which allows us to predict and resolve spikes in our grid load  This helps us prevent our electrical grids from becoming overloaded and ensures a reliable energy supply for our customers  System Operations is thus an essential part of Liander and is always looking for new innovations that improve our service  Your working conditions You have the energy  we give you the space   the space to get the best out of yourself  Because that benefits everyone  you  Alliander and most of all our customers  And there s more  In this role  you can expect  based on a 38 hour working week   A good salary  depending on your training and experience  junior max  gross monthly salary  4 530  scale 8   mid level max  gross monthly salary  5 127  scale 9  gross monthly salary  senior max  gross monthly salary  6 001  scale 10   A permanent contract after one year  A Personal Budget of 18  of your annual salary on a full time basis  You can choose to have this paid out  to purchase extra leave days or to pay it into your pension  An allowance of 70  of the statutory minimum wage for parental leave hours  This applies if you take parental leave after one year of service  36 hours  4 5 days  extra saved leave each year  You can use this leave or save it for up to 10 years for a sabbatical etc  A long term employability budget of  500  You can use this for career development  a gym membership and or ergonomic home office furniture etc  A pension with ABP  Alliander pays 70  of your pension premium  A fixed year end bonus of 5 94   Alliander offers you plenty of space and opportunities for development  We work with the best trainers in the Netherlands  You can choose from a wide range of training courses  workshops  study programmes  study books  webinars and e learning modules  An NS Business Card or a mileage allowance if you travel by car  A gross contribution of  360 and discounts on supplementary insurance if you have a collective health insurance policy with Zilveren Kruis Achmea  A laptop and mobile phone  or Bring Your Own Device  You ll be surprised by the excellent working conditions at Alliander  We have listed these for you at https   werkenbij alliander com arbeidsvoorwaarden Your background Your energy means you excel as an expert  Your motivation  skills and broad perspective help you take the team to the next level  You actively seek out collaboration  both within and beyond System Operations  You are a hard worker who can operate effectively at the strategic  tactical and operational level  and you don t give up easily  You re not afraid to try new things  At System Operations  we believe in  learning by doing   This also means you have a huge amount of freedom to work autonomously as a team  This role offers you the opportunity to develop and grow into the role of senior expert or Product Owner  In your work  Energy Technology and IT come together  What we ask of you  At least a completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in electrical engineering  energy technology  control engineering  physics or mechanical engineering and experience with IT or A completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in IT Data Science and experience with electrical engineering  energy technology or physics Experience with low voltage  medium voltage or high voltage grid structures or security concepts  load flow calculations  short circuit calculations or selectivity calculations would be an advantage  That you are an innovative thinker with strong analytical skills and problem solving competences who can bridge the gap between energy technology and IT solutions  That you are flexible and focused on innovation  you are motivated to include your colleagues in new applications  including in non technical areas   Please note  you must be resident in the Netherlands  If you do not live in the Netherlands  we will not be able to process your application  Your action We have space for your energy  If you would like more information about this vacancy  please contact Peter Wessels  System Development Chapter Lead  on peter wessels alliander com or 06 52305498  If you would like more information about the application procedure  please contact Astrid van Dijk  Corporate Recruiter  on astrid van dijk alliander Eneco eMobility groeit snel in Nederland  België en Duitsland  Het portfolio  de processen en het IT landschap veranderen continu om deze groei mogelijk te maken  We vertrouwen steeds meer op data om de verandering in de juiste richting mogelijk te maken en eMobility e asy te maken voor onze klanten  Wat je doet  Organiseer en analyseer gegevens en maak rapporten om  Geef het management inzicht in prestatie indicatoren  Geef inzicht in datakwaliteit en verbeteractiviteiten  Impactanalyses  bijv  getroffen klantgroepen  van voorgestelde wijzigingen uit te voeren  Het adviseren van de business over de relevantie van datakwaliteit  hoe te verbeteren en gebruik te maken van de gegenereerde data  Identificeren van procesverbeteringen op basis van data analyse  Het opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om gecreëerde waarde als gevolg van verandering te valideren  Opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om continu de bedrijfsgereedheid van eindgebruikers te meten  Voer ad hoc analyses uit in het geval van zakelijke kansen of problemen  Uw team  Het team van Eneco eMobility opereert internationaal en bestaat uit 175 medewerkers verspreid over drie landen  In Team Change Management werken 6 collega s in Nederland en 3 collega s in Duitsland  Functie eisen Wij hebben zeer gemotiveerde mensen in dienst die werken aan een bijzonder goed product  Daarom is niet iedereen fit  Controleer of je jezelf herkent in deze kenmerken   Je houdt ervan om de core business van eMobility te begrijpen en na te denken over hoe data inzichten de resultaten kunnen verhogen  Je bent gewend om de business proactief te adviseren over het maken van managementrapportages  Datakwaliteit is belangrijk voor u  Het opleiden van het bedrijf over het belang en het onderzoeken van de datakwaliteit is een typisch iets dat je op een vrijdagmiddag zou doen  Je bent 40 uur per week beschikbaar  Je spreekt  over de grens   Engels toch  Ook Duits  Perfect   Je hebt ervaring met PowerBI  Wij kiezen voor hybride werk  Dat betekent dat je twee dagen op kantoor  bij voorkeur Rotterdam  werkt  de plek waar je je collega s ontmoet  De andere dagen werk je vanuit huis  Zo flexibel  Uiteraard zorgen wij voor de juiste faciliteiten voor uw thuiswerkplek  We offer you  All terms and conditions of employment are well arranged  Nevertheless  we think it is also crucial to have additional focus on keeping energized as this can be expected from a charging company  The pace is high and eMobility is moving fast  Aspects as fun  personal development  appreciation  mental and physical fitness are equally or even more important than speed

 een groothandel dat merkloos speelgoed verkoopt aan verschillende winkelketens in Nederland  Hier komen dagelijks veel klanten om hun speelgoed in te kopen voor diverse winkelketens  Er zijn veel verschillende soorten speelgoed te koop en het is natuurlijk erg belangrijk dat duidelijk zichtbaar is welke artikelen in te kopen zijn voor de klant  Recent heeft Toi Toys een nieuw computer systeem in gebruik genomen  Het is een eenvoudig te hanteren computer systeem waarin je producten op nummer in kan voeren  De bedoeling is dat jij het speelgoed dat in de showroom staat handmatig in het computer systeem invoert  Het speelgoed beoordeel je per artikel en vanuit daar voer je handmatig de code in die op de sticker staat in  Het invoeren doe je handmatig op bijvoorbeeld merk  kleur  artikel of prijs  Ook geef je aan of het artikel baterijen in gebruik heeft en welke dat zijn en in welk aantal  Natuurlijk is het belangrijk dat je zorgvuldig en secuur te werk gaat  Het is tenslotte job_desc: Atria  hét Kennisinstituut voor Emancipatie en Vrouwengeschiedenis zoekt een Data  en Informatiespecialist  m v x  28 32 uur p w    Atria beheert en verzamelt het erfgoed van vrouwen en vrouwenbewegingen  We beheren o a  het archief van Aletta Jacobs  UNESCO Memory of the World  en Dolle Mina   Wil jij helpen onze collecties digitaal zichtbaarder te maken en houdbaar voor de toekomst  Ben jij bekend met de uitdagingen en kansen van  meta data en heb je affiniteit met digitaal erfgoed  Dan zoeken we jou  Word jij enthousiast van technische uitdagingen  En is datamapping  datatransformatie  metadata standaarden  aggregatieplatformen en API s en jouw passie  Het is meegenomen als je tevens goed op de hoogte bent van de ontwikkelingen op het gebied van privacy  en veiligheid  Als Data  en Informatiespecialist ben je innovatief en creatief en is je belangrijkste taak de unieke digitale collectie van Atria toekomstbestendig te maken   Wie wij zijn  Wij zetten ons in voor een gendergelijke samenleving  waarin mensen zoveel mogelijk gelijke behandeling  gelijke rechten en gelijke kansen krijgen  Mensen voelen zich verbonden met elkaar  zodat de lang bevochten mensenrechten daadwerkelijk in praktijk worden gebracht  Dit doen we door wereldwijd één van de oudste collecties en archieven over vrouwen en gender te verzamelen  te beheren en te delen   De komende jaren is het belangrijk dat onze beschikbare digitale data goed doorzoekbaar is en online vindbaar  Ook duurzame digitale archivering is een belangrijke speerpunt  Atria neemt zoveel mogelijk deel aan landelijke en internationale digitaliseringsactiviteiten en probeert op innovatieve wijze bij te dragen aan de actuele beschikbaarstelling van haar  erfgoed materiaal   Ons motto  Sharing the past job_desc: Let s talk talentYou have talent  Ready to make impact  We know  We also know that making impact starts with that first contact between likeminded people who have the same drive to shape their future  We see you  with your skills  personality and dreams  Now let s take it to even greater heights by means of one of our traineeships We are Mploy Associates  a talent focused consultancy firm ready to make not only our clients  teams successful but also you  Your talent  our focus More specifically We are a consultancy firm specialized in the areas of data  finance and risk and work on a variety of projects like investment analyses  data engineering  quant modelling and much more  Our clients are banks  insurance companies  asset managers  pension funds and we are still expanding We help our clients build successful teams by providing the rights skills  talents and knowhow at the right place and time and develop ourselves continuously to stay successful  We believe that investing in talent through proven methods always pays out  Today we are proud to say that we are an international driven company with more than 80 people and many top tier clients who share the same vision How you fit into this vision You will work as a Data Expert for one of our clients with a special focus on your own development through one of our Talent Programs  Our Talent Programs are designed to accelerate your career from a junior to medior  level within 24 months  By means of certified training courses  coaching and intervision sessions our employees follow an above average steep career curve  Successful graduation in our Talent Programs usually results in a permanent medior  or senior position at one of our clients where it becomes your responsibility to keep the team successful Your activities as a Data ExpertYour responsibilities will include collecting  interpreting  and processing large datasets  You often have to investigate and edit the sources of this data yourself  by using SQL  SAS  and or Python  You select the relevant variables  edit the data  and apply the business rules  On top of that  you can also be involved in data engineering projects where you are building platforms or data warehousing  Examples of your day to day responsibilities are Discussing data requirements for different quantitative modelsMaking an inventory of the relevant databases within the bank and gaining access to themMerging  joining and aggregating tables in SQL  SAS and or PythonDevising and applying data quality analyzes  e g   identifying trends over time  missing values  and extreme values Visualize data by means of interactive dashboardsInvestigating the plausibility of the new dataDeveloping data lakes and pipelines in Microsoft Azure  AWS or HadoopDocumenting the data sourcing process and descriptive statistics whilst discussing this with the business unitsFurthermore  you will be the main point of contact for different stakeholders who would like to understand the data as well as you do What are we looking for For the position Data Expert we are looking for graduates with different data related backgrounds  experiences  and passions  To specify You have 0 3 years of work experience and want to learn everything about big data and the processing of this kind of dataYou want to put your data related knowledge that you have gained during your master into practice  e g   Data Science  Computer Science  Artificial Intelligence  Aerospace Engineering or another related study You have experience with programming in SQL or at least are an expert in working with large data filesYou are ambitious  self reflective and dare to be confident in an authentic wayYou do not hesitate to use your analytical skills to solve complex problems in a creative and logical wayYou are energized by stakeholder management and you are well adept at gathering reliable information What do we offer We offer the opportunity to become an expert in data analysis in an environment where we train you in a proven way to excel into a high end professional  In addition  good working conditions are just as important to us  This includes the following Working 4 days a week at a large bank or insurance company in Amsterdam  Utrecht  Rotterdam or The Hague1 day a week in house training with personalized and professional coachingRegularly fun team activities  think of escape rooms  drinks and dinnersAn international working environment with colleagues from all over the worldPro bono projects at socially relevant NGOsThe opportunity to make the next career move with the client after successfully completing the Talent ProgramEverything you need for an amazing home officeAnd of course  a competitive salary  performance bonus and fringe benefitsAnd don t forget a public transport card or company bikeCurious For more information about our different Talent Programs you can visit our website www mployassociates com  Want to know more As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

Bedrijfsomschrijving Je komt te werken bij Toi Toys een groothandel in merkloos speelgoed op locatie Eindhoven Airport  Functieomschrijving In de ochtend kom je de showroom van Toi Toys binnen gelopen  een groothandel dat merkloos speelgoed verkoopt aan verschillende winkelketens in Nederland  Hier komen dagelijks veel klanten om hun speelgoed in te kopen voor diverse winkelketens  Er zijn veel verschillende soorten speelgoed te koop en het is natuurlijk erg belangrijk dat duidelijk zichtbaar is welke artikelen in te kopen zijn voor de klant  Recent heeft Toi Toys een nieuw computer systeem in gebruik genomen  Het is een eenvoudig te hanteren computer systeem waarin je producten op nummer in kan voeren  De bedoeling is dat jij het speelgoed dat in de showroom staat handmatig in het computer systeem invoert  Het speelgoed beoordeel je per artikel en vanuit daar voer je handmatig de code in die op de sticker staat in  Het invoeren doe je handmatig op bijvoorbeeld merk  kleur  artikel of prijs  Ook geef je aan of het artikel baterijen in gebruik heeft en welke dat zijn en in welk aantal  Natuurlijk is het belangrijk dat je zorgvuldig en secuur te werk gaat  Het is tenslotte belangrijk dat alle goederen goed en op de juiste manier in het systeem gezet worden  Het gaat hier om een tijdelijke functie van ongeveer 6 tot 8 weken  Het is mogelijk om parttime of fulltime te werken  Halve dagen of hele dagen  in overleg is veel mogelijk  Belangrijker is dat jij op korte termijn beschikbaar bent en goed bent in het werken met nieuwe systemen  Functie eisen De Nederlandse taal spreek en begrijp jij goed Jij kan goed met computers en verschillende programma s overweg Verder ben jij tijdelijk beschikbaar voor een periode van 6 tot 8 weken Arbeidsvoorwaarden Een tijdelijke functie waarin je parttime of fulltime kan werken Uurloon tussen de  12   en  13   per uur Als je interesse hebt in deze baan  solliciteer dan via deze vacature  Wij gaan je sollicitatie bekijken en nemen telefonisch contact met je op  Als we beide enthousiast zijn  dan nodigen wij je uit voor een gesprek via Microsoft Teams   In de tussentijd kun je ons volgen op Facebook en Instagram  Als je een kijkje neemt  LIKE je ons dan meteen even  Vind ons op Facebook  OlympiaUitzendbureauVeldhoven Vind ons op Instagram  OlympiaVeldhoven Contactgegevens Nicole van Ierland De Run job_desc: As our Data Analyst  you are responsible for making Helloprint a more data driven company where data is used to drive action in every team  every day  Depending on the team you will join  you will improve daily decision making and build automations using data  work on  and execute our Pricing strategies  or are responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio  In every team  we have a big amount of data at our fingertips with over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  300 production partners  and active business in 13 countries At Helloprint we are looking for a Junior Medior Data Analyst for 3 teams  Data Analytics team  You make business results measurable and know how to get the insights needed to take action  You help team members of other departments to specify their goals and translate them into KPIs and data requirements  By using your knowledge of SQL  Python  and R to perform analyses and act based on that data  You are a strategic thinker  but not afraid of picking up the trash yourself either  You are proactive in identifying opportunities  starting projects with business teams across Helloprint  You are able to clearly communicate complex  technical topics in a way that s understandable and shows clear suggestions for the next actions  Pricing team As Helloprint s Pricing Data Analyst  you are responsible for the commercial execution of our pricing strategies  Based on your research and analyses you are responsible for the optimization of our pricing models  This will be a very challenging job  our business is in 13 countries and we have over 10 million unique products that require pricing  You know all the in s and out s of the pricing business and you will make sure our product offering always has the most competitive pricing  You have the vision  where do we go with our pricing strategies  How can we improve our margins  Supply Data team  As a Data Analyst within the Supply Data team  you re responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio together with the team  With over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  and 300 production partners  this is a huge amount of data  Retrieving  translating  and mapping data to our platform standard from any source or automation of data related processes using Python and or Alteryx is something you feel comfortable with based on your knowledge and skills  On top of taking you are given the responsibility to take the lead in certain projects from the get go given your experience  Does this make your eyes grow bigger  your hands start to itch  and do you feel the desire to make an impact and create fast growth  Look no more  This is the place for you  Are you ready for this  What we are looking for 1 2 years  Junior level  or 2 4 years  Medior level  of experience in data analytics  A Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science  Mathematics  Economics  Engineering  Operations Research  Statistics  Business or other related technical disciplines  Master s Degree is a plus   Excellent analytical skills  SQL   Python or R highly preferred   Advanced experience with Excel  For the role in the Data team  experience in website tracking  Google Analytics  Google Tag Manager  Segment  Snowplow or similar tools  and data orchestration tools  Airflow  dbt   Experience with Alteryx is a plus  Experience with working on strategic challenges and collaborating with management level stakeholders  A strong commercial mindset  you see opportunities and make sure we act on them  Experience in a scale up and e commerce setting is a plus  What we offer Attractive salary and bonus structure  Stock Option Program possibility after six months  A unique challenge at a fast growing European e commerce company  Smart and highly driven co workers who work on big challenges and a big dream  A fast paced learning curve and opportunities to grow and develop yourself in an environment where freedom and responsibility are central  An unique culture with 32 nationalities and with an average age of 30  Opportunities to grow  even into our Leadership Team  We don t look for age or background  if you are extremely good  you will grow quickly  Great office locations  In The Netherlands  Rotterdam on the Witte de Withstraat  just 5 minutes from Rotterdam Central Station  in Valencia  Spain in the heart of the city Center  You can work in both locations  Breakfast  lunch and dinner on us  Enough to keep you going all day  24 7 access to our HelloFit gym More about Helloprint  Helloprint is the number one marketplace for customized print products  We bring local production and delivery to a global audience of creative entrepreneurs  SMBs and e commerce companies  reducing cost  speed of delivery and carbon footprint  What differs Helloprint  is our 200  team from 32 countries  all working in an entrepreneurial culture where freedom and responsibility are leading to high performance  We are driven by our culture  motivated by impact and focused on creating something beautiful together  We love diversity  we love change and we love to give back where we can Up for it   Our Helloprint Battolyser Systems is looking to recruit a Data Scientist Welcome to Battolyser Systems  a fully funded  cleantech scale up company based in The Netherlands  We develop and manufacture products that can store electricity and produce hydrogen from renewable power to balance societal demand in a truly revolutionary way  Let us take you on this journey and show how you can make a difference by joining a fast growing purpose driven company   First  some background information on Battolyser Systems  Seven years ago  some really smart people at the Delft University of Technology invented the world s first integrated battery and electrolyser system  They named it a  Battolyser  and realized this invention could connect renewable power generation in a revolutionary way with how society will consume energy in a net zero emission world  To make real impact  the technology was spun out of the Delft University of Technology into a separate company in 2018 to demonstrate a proof of concept in an industrial setting  And so  Battolyser Systems was born  Fast forward to today  We have a patented and proven technology  customers are lined up and funding is secured  We have also attracted top talent in the renewable energy and hydrogen market  whom are passionate and motivated to make a difference  Knowledgeable  connected and committed are some of the keywords that best describe current leadership  In growing the company we are looking for a data scientist to join our team and help us and our customers realize the value that Battolyser unlocks The Role  This role is part of the business development team  You are responsible for modelling and optimizing the value a Battolyser creates  Thanks to the unique technology a Battolyser unlocks value in different electricity markets  day ahead  balancing and frequency  and by producing clean hydrogen  In your role you will interact closely with the rest of the business development team and potentially with customers and the product team  Specific task include   Own and improve a Python model that optimizes and compares the value of Battolyser to competing technologies Set up a robust  version control environment to manage model development in a structured manner Work with the business development and sales team to model the performance of a Battolyser in different set ups  e g  grid connected  off grid  hydrogen customer on site  and geographies Use data visualization tools to develop reports to present the outcomes of your modelling Identify and implement new algorithms to optimize the trade offs that a Battolyser allows a customers to make  Co  Develop a strategy to help our customers realize the value of a Battolyser  including options to support customers to operate  dispatch  the Battolyser in real time The Person  We feel  in order to be successful in this role  you need at least 2 4 years of experience with Python in a professional context  You need to have a firm grip on Object Oriented Programming  OOP  and be comfortable in Git  Also  experience with data visualization is a must  You are self driven and intrinsically motivated to build the best model possible and unlock value to our customers  You can strike a good balance between optimizing and being flexible to tailor your priorities to business needs  Finally  you want to learn and aspire a career in renewable energy  Oh  and if you have experience in data science  operational optimization or energy market modelling that would really set you apart  How to apply  Hopefully we managed to get you interested  If you feel you are the right fit with the right motivation we can t wait to receive your application  Battolyser Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer and welcomes Diversity

job_desc: Atria  hét Kennisinstituut voor Emancipatie en Vrouwengeschiedenis zoekt een Data  en Informatiespecialist  m v x  28 32 uur p w    Atria beheert en verzamelt het erfgoed van vrouwen en vrouwenbewegingen  We beheren o a  het archief van Aletta Jacobs  UNESCO Memory of the World  en Dolle Mina   Wil jij helpen onze collecties digitaal zichtbaarder te maken en houdbaar voor de toekomst  Ben jij bekend met de uitdagingen en kansen van  meta data en heb je affiniteit met digitaal erfgoed  Dan zoeken we jou  Word jij enthousiast van technische uitdagingen  En is datamapping  datatransformatie  metadata standaarden  aggregatieplatformen en API s en jouw passie  Het is meegenomen als je tevens goed op de hoogte bent van de ontwikkelingen op het gebied van privacy  en veiligheid  Als Data  en Informatiespecialist ben je innovatief en creatief en is je belangrijkste taak de unieke digitale collectie van Atria toekomstbestendig te maken   Wie wij zijn  Wij zetten ons in voor een gendergelijke samenleving  waarin mensen zoveel mogelijk gelijke behandeling  gelijke rechten en gelijke kansen krijgen  Mensen voelen zich verbonden met elkaar  zodat de lang bevochten mensenrechten daadwerkelijk in praktijk worden gebracht  Dit doen we door wereldwijd één van de oudste collecties en archieven over vrouwen en gender te verzamelen  te beheren en te delen   De komende jaren is het belangrijk dat onze beschikbare digitale data goed doorzoekbaar is en online vindbaar  Ook duurzame digitale archivering is een belangrijke speerpunt  Atria neemt zoveel mogelijk deel aan landelijke en internationale digitaliseringsactiviteiten en probeert op innovatieve wijze bij te dragen aan de actuele beschikbaarstelling van haar  erfgoed materiaal   Ons motto  Sharing the past  debating the present and creating the future  helpt hierin het verleden aan het heden te koppelen en de toekomst te creëren  Dit doet Atria op nationaal en internationaal niveau met een team van ongeveer 35 medewerkers   De functie  De Data  en Informatiespecialist is een technische functie waarin datamanagement  support engineering en softwareontwikkeling worden gecombineerd  De Data  en Informatiespecialist is primair verantwoordelijk data kwaliteit van de verschillende collecties binnen Atria  Hierbij ligt de nadruk op standaardisering  opschoning en optimalisatie van de data en
