job_desc: Hunt   Hackett helps European companies prevent  detect and respond to today s most advanced adversaries  safeguarding them against cyberthreats and espionage  We don t stir a bit into security strategies  our talented team of responsible rebels shakes them up to build  operate and maintain digital immune systems for our customers to outsmart their digital adversaries   To extend our multidisciplinary team we are now hiring Data scientist   Developer  Are you thorough by default and pragmatic when needed  Do you like to explain to your friends how your piece of code found the Russian adversary in the terabytes of event data  You know that Pandas are more than just black  and white coloured fluffy animals  Do you belong to the most talented group of data scientist and   or developers in the industry   or is this where you plan to be  Then Hunt   Hackett might be your next best step   Data Scientist at Hunt   Hackett  Data science is a core competency and focus within Hunt   Hackett and not just an ingredient of our marketing storyline  We believe that modern cyber security and catching bad guys requires data science in order to build  operate and maintain a digital immune system  This gives the power to our clients to safeguard their organization against cyber attacks  To do this we collect  big data and use our tradecraft to create  real time  insights that guide our actions in order to secure our customers   Hunt   Hackett is currently in start up phase  This means that you work highly independently and no one needs to explain to you what needs to be done  You have experience with properly processing large amounts of data and developing code around this  You do this by applying the latest software development and architectural paradigms  which ultimately gives you warm and fuzzy feelings  Your standard modus operandi is developing robust  high quality  reusable and production level source code  However  you have a pragmatic attitude as well and nothing is stopping you if you are in a situation that requires direct patching code in a production environment   You have architectural capabilities and like to glue things together  ranging from internal business processes to individual systems  applications and API s  In practice this means that next to your innovative projects  you support internal processes related to Incident Response  Threat Intelligence and our Cyber Defense Center   Furthermore  you might be interested in Hunt   Hackett because you like the company name  or having an office close to the beach  However  we are not yet another company and we would like to see that next to your passion for data science and software development  you have an interest as well in finding bad stuff and contributing to safeguarding our society   Hunt   Hackett is not yet another security company and we expect our employees to match that  We are looking for data science and software development passion  but expect you to have a strong interest in finding bad stuff and making society more secure as well   The Hunt   Hackett wish list  The right candidate The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  Is able to demonstrate their experience by showing their source code and or projects worked on   showyourgithub An aspiration to fulfill a role as an expert architect on technical projects  Preferred development language experience in Python and JavaScript  Experience with Pandas  Scikit learn and Spark or similar tools and techniques  Experience with Cloud services in AWS  GCP  Azure and cloud tools like Google Big Query   What is your wish list  As a minimum  Hunt   Hackett offers you The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  A unique culture of  responsible rebellion  where you can learn from the best to get the most out of yourself  The most innovative security tools you need to get the job done  Plenty of time and opportunity to develop yourself with regards to SOC  IR  Red Teaming etc   A proper laptop and phone to get the job done  A modern pension  which is transparent and can be controlled by yourself  Employee share participation scheme  Compensation for your travel costs   A culture of  responsible rebellion   Only  very  talented  multidisciplinary teams of threat hunters  intelligence analysts  reverse engineers  data scientists  developers and hackers are able to outsmart the increasingly professional community of cyber attackers  We pride ourselves as a force for the good and as such we think and act as responsible rebels  We are not  just another security company   and our people are not  just employees   Everyone at Hunt   Hackett wants to be the best in their field and focusses at delivering next gen levels of service  This means that we  Push the envelope  Everyone at our teams takes the responsibility to make our work better every day  by being creative to color outside of the lines if needed  Help you to become the best version of yourself  We bring together the best minds in the field  to inspire each other and to learn from each other  Personal development and growth are important to us and our customers  Build mission driven teams  We believe in the power of small teams who can focus on strategic tasks  not on repetitive work that can be automated  It s up to you to make this happen  Believe that God is in the details  Tiny details can have a huge impact  especially in security  This is why we champion tradecraft  We are system thinkers that oversee the big picture but who are simultaneously obsessive about the details Are Responsible Rebels  We are polite  We are courteous  We show professionalism  For more information or to apply  send an email to info huntandhackett com

organisatie Wij zijn Huisman  Wij ontwikkelen  step changing  technische oplossingen en vertalen deze naar het ontwerp en de bouw van de grootste constructie apparatuur  Al decennia werken we over de hele wereld voor de sectoren offshore wind  geothermie  olie   gas  recreatie en civiele werken  Met onze gepassioneerde medewerkers en wereldwijde productie   service  en salesfaciliteiten zijn wij  in deze tijd van transitie   equipped for impact    We houden ervan om iets te maken dat nog niet bestaat  En als het al wel bestaat  dan weet ik dat we het nog beter kunnen maken    Robin van Boven  Principal Engineer Over de functie Data Scientist Preventive Maintenance Wat kun je verwachten van de functie Data Scientist binnen Huisman  Je kunt denken aan het krijgen van uitstekende overzichten van het daadwerkelijke gebruik van onze apparatuur  het vergelijken van het gebruik met de ontwerpcriteria en het ontwikkelen van tooling om de resterende levensduur te voorspellen en onze producten team analyseert tegelijkertijd data  ontwikkelt tooling en voert predictive maintenance uit voor klanten  Wat ga je doen  Trends identificeren patronen analyseren in meetgegevens  validatiemogelijkheden uitbreiden  Samen met engineers nieuwe metrics  dashboards en visualisatie ontwikkelen nadat je alle nodige checks hebt gedaan  De resultaten van je analyse rapporteren aan onze Assisteren van onze Global Services business line bij problemen die zich voordoen terwijl het product in gebruik is bij onze klanten  Oplossen van de dataproblemen en de communicatie daaromheen over datavisualisatie  Grafana  JavaScript  Python of C   en ervaring met databases zoals PostgreSQL  Kennis in of werkervaring met software schrijven of ontwerpen  Affiniteit met Besturingssystemen Hoe maak jij onze klanten blij  Bol com is een succesvolle speler binnen de platformeconomie  De afgelopen maanden werd  50  van de sales door partners gedreven  En hun aandeel groeit  Gegeven het strategische belang van het partnerplatform  is op directieniveau de portefeuille  Platform  ingericht  waar Platform Engagement onderdeel van is  Partner Engagement betrekt partners intensiever bij het platform en helpt hen customer centric te ondernemen  Bijvoorbeeld door partners te belonen voor klantvriendelijkheid  Als Data Analyst Partner Analytics til je partner engagement naar het volgende niveau door analytische onderbouwingen te bieden bij strategische en tactische afwegingen   Wat je doet als Data Analyst Partner Analytics Retail tech platform bol com groeit snel  Dit brengt complexe uitdagingen met zich mee  Hoe kunnen we partners  gegeven de explosieve groei van het netwerk  persoonlijk blijven bedienen en inspireren  Hoe richten we dat schaalbaar in  Hoe kunnen we de stem van de partner beter meewegen als we het platform aanpassen of vernieuwen  Welke aanpassingen hebben de grootste impact op de partnerbelevenis  En betaalt dat zich uit in betere prestaties  Waar zijn partners wel of juist minder tevreden over  Voldoende vraagstukken dus die schreeuwen om diepgaande  actiewaardige inzichten   Als Junior Data Analyst ga je aan de slag met de rijke data van bol com om antwoorden te vinden op jouw onderzoeksvragen  De analyses vertaal je naar dashboards en presentaties en deel je met collega s om bol com nog klant en partnervriendelijker te maken  Een impactvolle rol want er ligt veel ruimte om hypothese gedreven te pionieren in de datarijke omgeving van bol com  Je hebt regelmatig overleg met collega s om je onderzoeksvragen goed te definiëren Je spot patronen in een enorme bak gestructureerde en ongestructureerde data  waarbij je tools inzet als Big Query en je code opslaat in Gitlab Je vertaalt data naar werkbare inzichten en adviezen en brengt die helder over op collega s die  nog  wat minder data savvy zijn  Hiervoor gebruik je onder andere visualisatie tools zoals Tableau en Google Data Studio Je inspireert collega s om data gedreven te werken  bijvoorbeeld door dashboards te ontwikkelen en de voordelen van data inzichten enthousiast te belichten 3 redenen waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Laat zien waarom niet Laat zien waarom wel  Je wandelt het praatje niet Nee  als je geen ambassadeur van data gedreven werken bent en dashboards bouwt die alleen door jou worden begrepen  Je bent een loner Nee  als je vanuit een ivoren toren wilt analyseren  intensief stakeholdermanagement en het aanhaken van operationele collega s is beneden je stand  Je geeft een handje Nee  als je graag bij de hand wordt genomen en autonoom pionieren griezelig vindt   Je bent data meester Ja  als je een kwantitatieve MSc  combineert met 0 2 jaar ervaring in het uitvoeren van complexe data analyses en vraagstukken graag iteratief  op basis van hypotheses  uitwerkt    Je zoomt in en uit Ja  als je snel en soepel schakelt tussen microscopische details en holistisch overzicht   Je beheerst de toolbox Ja  als je al wat ervaring hebt met data analyse tools  zoals BiqQuery  SQL  en Tableau  Eventueel aangevuld met Google Data Studio  Adobe Analytics en of Python  Data Science ervaring  machine learning  text mining  is geen must  wel zeer welkom Hier kom je terecht Bij hét online retail tech platform van Nederland en België  Een platform waar 13 miljoen Nederlandse en Belgische klanten kiezen uit meer dan 33 miljoen artikelen  En een platform dat zo n 48 000 zakelijke partners helpt succesvol te ondernemen  Maar vooral een platform dat nooit  af  is  want bol com verandert retail al sinds 1999  En dat blijven we in Business Intelligence  BI   BI is het gehele proces rondom het verzamelen en structureren van data binnen een organisatie teneinde deze data om te zetten in bruikbare beslissingsondersteunende informatie  intelligence   Deze informatie kan vervolgens worden gevisualiseerd in een rapportage of dashboard met rapportagetools waardoor er beslissingen kunnen worden genomen op basis van feiten en cijfers Smart Data People start op 27 juni 2022 wederom een Data Traineeship waarin jij door specialisten met ervaring uit de praktijk opgeleid wordt tot een Junior Business Intelligence Professional Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

job_title: Data Steward (in rol van Business Analist) UWV Gegevensdiensten
job_desc: Bij UWV geven we invulling aan zinhoud door met elkaar te werken aan Persoonlijke en waardevolle dienstverlening voor al onze klanten  We willen dat zij zich goed geholpen voelen  UWV als betrouwbaar ervaren en gemakkelijk hun zaken bij ons kunnen regelen  Dat doen wij door onze kernactiviteiten doorlopend te verbeteren en te innoveren en te experimenteren met nieuwe vormen van dienstverlening  Bij Gegevensdiensten werken zo n 500 medewerkers met gegevens van personen en werkgevers  met de maatschappelijke taak om daar verantwoord mee om te gaan  We zijn een groeiende divisie die volop in ontwikkeling is  IV Gegevensdiensten is verdeeld in vier werkdomeinen  domein IV Office  domein Personen  domein Werkgevers en domein Datawarehouse  Binnen de domeinen wordt gewerkt in Agile teams  De teams van Datawarehouse bedienen specifieke klanten  divisies en staven  De producten die geleverd worden  kunnen dienen ter verantwoording aan bijvoorbeeld de minister  sturing op activiteiten  maar ook ter verbetering van de dienstverlening van UWV als het gaat om klantreizen  Daarnaast focust de UWV organisatie zich de komende jaren meer en meer op datagedreven werken  Datawarehouse levert een substantiële bijdrage om dit te kunnen realiseren  De vacature is ontstaan in het team dat met name de divisies Klant   Service en Handhaving als klant heeft   Wat we van je verwachten  Allereerst ben je een enthousiaste en prettige collega  die graag samenwerkt  Klantgericht denken en handelen zit in je DNA  Wij zoeken iemand die bij voorkeur een afgeronde HBO of universitaire studie in een relevante richting heeft gedaan  Een must is dat echter niet  Als je kunt aantonen voldoende ervaring te hebben in  een deel van  het werkveld én je hebt de wens je skills verder te ontwikkelen  dan helpen we je graag  Je bent een goede match als  Je kennis hebt van de AVG  Je op operationeel en tactisch niveau kan acteren  Je ervaring hebt met  SQL modellering  Data dictionaires of andere vormen van functionele documentatie  Autorisatiebeheer  Je bekend bent met  Het pseudonimiseren en anonimiseren van data  Privacy by design en privacy by default  Security by design en security by default  Je bent de perfecte match als  Je ervaring hebt met Microsoft SQL Server  Je kennis hebt van Datavault  Je kennis hebt van proces  en data analyse  marktonderzoek of datamining technieken  Je ook interesse hebt in Requirements analyse  Functioneel Ontwerp en Technisch Ontwerp   Wij zoeken deze functionele én technische kanten het liefst in één persoon  Als je vooral affiniteit hebt met één van beide kanten van deze functie dan nodigen we je toch nadrukkelijk uit om te solliciteren  Dit geldt met name voor de technische kant   Wat je van ons kan verwachten  UWV biedt naast een uitdagende baan uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden  zoals een goed salaris  een dertiende maand  een keuzeplan arbeidsvoorwaarden  een goede pensioenvoorziening  en aantrekkelijke regelingen voor opleiding en ontwikkeling   Je komt te werken bij een leuke en dynamische divisie met veel kennis en kunde  Omdat wij vakmanschap belangrijk vinden  ondersteunen wij je ook in je eigen leertraject  Daar krijg je alle ruimte voor  Wij streven naar een goede werk   privé balans  Daarbij streven wij ernaar om een weerspiegeling te zijn van onze maatschappij  Diversiteit staat bij ons hoog in het vaandel en jouw inbreng hierin is voor ons een verrijking  Verder bieden wij  Een salaris dat ligt tussen   3 878 36 en   5 283 54  bij een 38 urige werkweek   Een 13e maand  Een goede pensioenvoorziening  Aantrekkelijke studiemogelijkheden  Een werkplek die goed te bereiken is met OV  De mogelijkheid om in overleg vanuit huis werkzaamheden te verrichten   Iets meer over IV Organisatie binnen ons bedrijf  UWV is een organisatie met een maatschappelijke taak  Ruim 20 000 medewerkers in het hele land zetten zich dagelijks is om mensen aan het werk te helpen en te houden  We ondersteunen onze klanten in hun re integratie en bij het vinden van een baan  Waar nodig voorzien wij hen van tijdelijk inkomen  Zo bieden we onze klanten nieuw perspectief op deelname aan de maatschappij  In totaal hebben we 1 5 miljoen klanten  die we snel en deskundig dienstverlening op maat bieden   Gegevensdiensten beheert de polisadministratie met daarin miljarden gegevens over inkomens  uitkeringen en arbeidsverhoudingen van alle verzekerden in Nederland  En Gegevensdiensten beheert het doelgroepregister waar gegevens in staan van personen die onder de banenafspraak vallen  De divisie Gegevensdiensten is een belangrijke schakel in het gegevensverkeer tussen aanbieders en gebruikers van deze gegevens  Onze missie is   Wij helpen afnemers en burgers bij het realiseren van lastenverlichting en administratief gemak  Dit door hen op een betrouwbare en juiste manier gegevens en informatie uit het domein werk en inkomen te leveren    De divisie Gegevensdiensten is een van de belangrijke pijlers binnen UVW die gericht is op datagedreven werken  Het is de thuisplek van het Datawarehouse van UWV en de Business Intelligence en Business Analyse tooling  Hou je van data  dan kom je bij Gegevensdiensten werken  Met trots noemt Gegevensdiensten zich dan ook  bedreven met data en datagedreven    Interesse  Wij verzoeken u uitsluitend via de sollicitatielink te solliciteren

As data analyst you work on data collection  data mining  preprocessing and analysis  During this work  you will tackle technical mathematical and statistical problems  You are contributing to  and part of the Advanced Analytics team  The problem where you work on challenge you to learn the production processes  During this learning period  you investigate how processes can be improved in a data driven manner  When working as a data analyst you take the responsibility to improve the central data warehouse and are responsible for the analytical tools   reports you created   Profile BSc  BEng  MSc or PhD in Data Science  in Engineering or any quantitative or engineering field  econometrics  computer science  etc   Eager to learn about the manufacturing processes and systems Entrepreneurial spirit and drive to succeedCompetitive attitude and the need to constantly keep improving yourself Strong communication skills Some of our projects for Data analysts Advanced analytics is creating a data science platform within Prodrive Technologies which aids and supplements our colleagues in any way possible  For example  by giving them real time insights in various processes  automating time consuming tasks and involving everyone in our data driven vision  Products manufactured by Prodrive Technologies range from smart thermostats and automotive wallboxes to large compute cabinets and gradient amplifiers  To ensure high quality production  all these products have a final  visual inspection step where each product is inspected before it is packed and shipped to customers  Inspections including presence and anomaly detection are automated using the Keras and Tensorflow deep learning libraries where the classification and autoencoders models are developed and trained in house  To improve the factory efficiency even more  these techniques will also be applied to factory data such as cycle times and process parameters for the purpose of diagnostics and predictive analysis  The Prodrive Technologies Mindset Responsibility You don t just go to work  you feel responsible for your project Flexible You decide when  where and how much you want to work Manufacturing You like to think about manufacturability when designing Initiative You don t sit and wait  you have a hands on mentality What we offer Perfect environment for people willing to take full responsibility in a project Unlimited growth opportunities and freedom in taking different roles in different projects Young and dynamic culture Unlimited personal budget for training courses  classes or studies We are open 24 7 and provide lunch  dinner and a company gym We keep management positions to a minimum  so there is virtually no hierarchy Create your future with your own personal development plan Tools and equipment such as an iPhone  iPad and laptop The flexibility to work wherever and how much you want Salary that grows with your performance Opportunity to become a shareholder and entrepreneur in the company Travel allowance based on the days you are actually at Prodrive 31 Holidays Money for retirement Distribution of profits Application steps We ll take a look at your application as soon as possible  You will receive a link to Prodrive Technologies  online aptitude test to see if you re up for the challenge  We will set you up for a personal interview to ask you difficult questions about yourself  Afterwards  others will ask you some more difficult questions about your expertise  We will immediately decide if we will make you an offer after the interviews  When there s enough time left  we will discuss employment conditions directly after the interviews  If you survived everything  only your signature stands between you and being a Prodriver

job_title: Trainer for Research Data Management & Digital Skills
job_desc: Trainer for Research Data Management   Digital Skills  Apply Now Join the Research Data Services at TU Delft   4TU ResearchData as trainer for Research Data Management   Digital skills Job description As a Trainer on ResearchData Management   Digital skills your main task is to organise and provide training to PhD candidates and researchers at TU Delft  as well as to lead 4TU ResearchData s training engagement as part of its collaboration within ResearchData Netherlands  RDNL    In addition to delivering training  within your role at TU Delft you will also develop new courses to help implement the  Vision for Research Data Management Training at TU Delft   To do this  you will work closely with the faculty data stewards  the Digital Competence Centre and with the Teachers and Trainers Network at TU Delft Library   Your role within 4TU ResearchData will consist of coordinating and or delivering courses provided by RDNL  such as Essentials4DataSupport and GDPR4DataSupport   but also leading the work of the RDNL Training Working Group  You will also engage with data stewards from the 4TU ResearchData partner institutions to exchange practice and collaborate on training   Both TU Delft and 4TU ResearchData have strong links to other organisations nationally and internationally  meaning that you will also have ample opportunities to engage in development and delivery of courses and training collaborations together with other partners and to strengthen your own networks   Your main tasks will be  Organisation and delivery of training on research data management and digital skills at TU Delft  e g  RDM 101  software data carpentries  Personal Data in Research   Development and implementation of new courses on research data management and digital skills at TU Delft  Organisation and or delivery of training as part of Research Data Netherlands  RDNL   e g  Essential4DataSupport  GDPR4DataSupport   Representing 4TU ResearchData on matters pertaining to training in RDNL and leading the RDNL training Working Group  Engaging in collaboration and training delivery with 4TU ResearchData partner institutions  as appropriate  Participating in the activities of the TU Delft Library Teachers and Trainers Network   Requirements We are looking for enthusiastic candidates who  Have experience organising  providing and developing training  face to face and online  to PhD candidates and Researchers  Have good project management skills and enjoy coordination  as well as collaboration  Have excellent communication skills to liaise with researchers  data stewards and other stakeholders on current and future training needs  Have knowledge on Research Data Management and Digital skills and enjoy following recent trends in these fields  Have an MSc degree or equivalent understanding of the research environment  PhD degree would be a plus  Have a good command of English  written and spoken  Dutch would be a plus  Strive to create an open  safe and interactive learning environment within the training sessions  Are willing to advance and learn new skills to develop and provide training  e g  educational skills  software management skills   Optional  Are familiar with programming and software data carpentry workshops  Conditions of employment Duration of contract is 1 year with prospect of permanent  A job of 36 40 hours per week  A salary based on scale 10 of the CAO for Dutch Universities with a minimum of   2 846   and a maximum of   4 490   gross per month based on a fulltime contract  38 hours   plus 8  holiday allowance and an end of year bonus of 8 3   An excellent pension scheme via the ABP  The possibility to compile an individual employment package every year  Discount with health insurers  Flexible working week  Every year  232 leave hours  at 38 hours   You can also sell or buy additional leave hours via the individual choice budget  Plenty of opportunities for education  training and courses  Partially paid parental leave Attention for working healthy and energetically with the vitality program  Please note that this position is based in the Netherlands  working remotely from abroad is not possible   TU Delft  Delft University of Technology  Delft University of Technology is built on strong foundations  As creators of the world famous Dutch waterworks meeting place  The Library helps to find valuable knowledge needed for education and research  and to publish and store the knowledge generated at TU Delft  We believe it is important that knowledge is easily accessible and freely available to everyone  In this way  knowledge can flow freely and TU Delft s knowledge can become valuable to others  The Library is also a place where everyone can heldere analyses en voorspelmodellen laten zien hoe de Goede Doelen Loterijen de komende jaren nog verder kunnen groeien  Dan zijn wij opzoek naar jou  Wat ga je doen  Je werkt binnen de afdeling Marketing Intelligence   Technologie  het kenniscentrum van de Goede Doelen Loterijen  Een afdeling met een unieke combinatie tussen technologie en intelligentie en ruim 50 enthousiaste collega s  Het Data Science team bestaat op dit moment uit 6 slimme  gedreven professionals  Je bouwt  onderhoudt en automatiseert statistische modellen  Je adviseert management en directie op basis van analyses en modellen  Je informeert stakeholders over de gerealiseerde resultaten en adviseert over strategie  Je initieert kwalitatief en kwantitatief onderzoek om onze  potentiële  klanten te begrijpen  Je onderbouwt gemaakte keuzes en adviezen met duidelijke redeneringen en data  Je werkt samen met marketeers  product owners  developers en andere stakeholders om onderzoeken en experimenten te ontwerpen  uit te voeren en resultaten te analyseren  Wat bieden wij jou  We werken normaal gesproken in het meest duurzaam vernieuwde pand van Nederland  op loopafstand van station Amsterdam Zuid  Naast een goed salaris en 25 vakantiedagen hebben we ook nog andere aantrekkelijke   unieke   arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals   Jaarcontract met uitzicht op verlenging voor onbepaalde tijd  Jouw persoonlijke VriendenLoterij VIP KAART  Gratis reizen met het openbaar vervoer door heel Nederland  Diverse ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden via onze Lottery Academy  De mogelijkheid om vrijwilligerswerk te doen in daadkracht en overtuigende kwaliteiten acties om te zetten in resultaten  Je bent een strategische kracht die met energie en creatief vermogen ons team komt versterken  Verder  Heb je minimaal HBO  werk  en denkniveau  Heb je minimaal drie jaar werkervaring in een vergelijkbare functie  Ben je ervaren met het bouwen en onderhouden van statistische modellen en machine learning algoritmes met SQL  R en of Python  Ben je bekend met Query  Cloud omgevingen   AWS   Docker  Wie zijn wij  De Goede Doelen Loterijen zijn ontstaan vanuit de missie fondsen te werven voor goede doelen  Inmiddels spelen ruim 3 5 miljoen Nederlanders mee met de Loterijen  winnen honderdduizenden mensen per maand prijzen en zijn we de grootste particuliere fondsenwerver van Nederland  Dankzij alle deelnemers wordt er dit jaar meer dan 500 miljoen euro geschonken aan goede doelen  Met dit geld worden veel belangrijke projecten op het gebied van mens en natuur  cultuur  gezondheid en welzijn mogelijk gemaakt  Bij de job_desc: UMBRiO staat voor kwaliteit  Wij zijn vakmensen  mensen met een passie en liefde voor het vakgebied waarin we werken  De dienstverlening van UMBRiO beweegt zich in het veld van data  ook wel big data of machine data genoemd  De toegevoegde waarde voor onze klanten ligt in het creëren van waarde op basis van data door analyse  correlatie van verschillende databronnen  ontdekken van dwarsverbanden of onvermoede relaties en het inzichtelijk maken van aspecten die besluitvorming en of sturing in organisaties ondersteunen  Met andere woorden  wij houden ons bezig met Business Value Realization op basis van data  Dit doen wij onder meer voor klanten als ABN AMRO  Rabobank  Nationale Nederlanden  Shell  Philips  ASML  KPN  Schiphol  SSC IT  De Rechtspraak en Mitsubishi Financial Group   Wie zoeken wij  Als Data Analist bij UMBRiO ben je de aangewezen persoon om antwoorden te vinden op complexe data vraagstukken  Je weet de vertaalslag te maken tussen de vraag en de beschikbare data  naar een model en een oplossing op basis van de beschikbare data om op deze wijze vanuit de data de wensen van de klant  business IT security  inzichtelijk te maken   Je ontdekt structuren in data die niet gestructureerd is en die structuur gebruik je oplossingsgericht om   in samenspraak met de business  consultant analist    vraagstukken te beantwoorden  verbeteringen te ontdekken of anderen te ondersteunen in hun werkzaamheden met informatieproducten als visualisatie via dashboards  automatische acties via een workflow  alerts of rapportages   De Data Analist weet te identificeren welke data er nodig is om oplossingen  door  te ontwikkelen  Als de benodigde data niet voor analyse beschikbaar is  zal hij zij  eventueel in samenwerking met een engineer  zorgen voor ontsluiting van deze data   Daarnaast koppelt hij zij de resultaten  oplossingen of verbeteringen terug naar stakeholders  waarbij de boodschap is afgestemd op de doelgroep die een breedspectrum kan omvatten van leek tot expert op het gebied van Data Science   Ook het verrijken verbinden van  big data met bijvoorbeeld  machine   bedrijfs   onderzoek  en externe data zijn onderdeel van het werkveld   Taakomschrijving Weet structuur te vinden in ongestructureerde datasets Weet vragen vanuit de business te vertalen naar statistische gestructureerde wiskundige modellen Vindt antwoorden Data zijn voor bedrijven één  test  van de key resources  Het wordt tijd dat hier serieus werk van wordt gemaakt  Maar hoe doe je dat  Jij maakt als business analist data grote impact bij klanten met het antwoord op deze vraag  zodat zij kunnen versnellen en klaar zijn voor de toekomst  Geen data omgeving is voor jou te complex  Jij loopt prettig voorop en stippelt alvast de route uit  Wat vragen wij van jou  Je bent zowel strategisch als technisch  Je zit vaak zelf aan de knoppen en kan ook ontwikkelaars en architecten briefen  Dit is je andere grote talent  goede gesprekken voeren  Met klanten  gebruikers en techneuten   in SCRUM team s  en met collega s door heel Nederland met allerlei expertises op datagebied  Daarnaast heb je   minimaal een hbo diploma  minstens 5 jaar ervaring als data modelleur  data engineer of data expert bij een IT dienstverlener of een grote datafabriek  zoals het Kadaster  actuele kennis van Domain Driven Design  DDD  en Event Driven Systems

Wat ga je doen  Als data analist genereer je kennis en daarmee waarde uit data  Je helpt mee om vanuit jouw kennis het data gedreven werken in de organisatie te introduceren  Met belanghebbenden door de hele organisatie identificeer je de behoefte en worden specifieke datavraagstukken geformuleerd  Je werkt nauw samen met de product owner  Je werkt met SQL en Python  ontsluit data uit verschillende systemen en prepareert deze  Je vergaart informatie uit de dataset met behulp van statische methodes  zoals correlatie en regressieanalyses  Je communiceert de resultaten met de belanghebbenden en visualiseert data voor hen in bijvoorbeeld Power BI  Ook schrijf je eindrapportages en maak je je eigen werkschema s  De functie van data analist is relatief nieuw binnen Cardia en initieel zal deze voor de periode van 1 jaar worden ingevuld  Echter zijn wij een groeiende organisatie en bij succes is het zeker mogelijk dat deze functie uiteindelijk blijvend zal zijn  Wij bieden Een plezierige werksfeer waar aan collegialiteit veel waarde wordt gehecht  In deze tijden spreekt het voor zich dat wij ook goede voorzieningen hebben om thuis te werken   De functie is nieuw en wordt derhalve momenteel beschreven en gewogen  een definitieve inschaling volgt zo spoedig mogelijk  Verwachting is echter dat deze ingeschaald zal worden in FWG50 met een maximum bruto maandloon van  3818 87 op basis van een 36 urige werkweek   Onze secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden hebben wij in samenspraak met onze medewerkers uitgebreid  Naast de collectieve korting op diverse verzekeringen hebben wij nu ook een fietsplan  sport  of fitnessabonnement regeling  computer laptopplan en een bonusregeling wanneer je een nieuwe collega aanbrengt   Je krijgt in beginsel één of meerdere tijdelijke contracten voor de totale duur van 2 jaar  Bij succes is verlenging een optie  Wat we zoeken Kennis  ervaring en deskundigheid Je hebt een opleiding afgerond op WO niveau richting statistiek  Voorts heb je enkele jaren praktijkervaring met het analyseren van bedrijfsprocessen  Je hebt kennis van en ervaring met Power bi  SQL en Python  Persoonskenmerken Als data analist weet je waar je het over hebt  de data weet je moeiteloos naar de  zorginhoudelijke  vragen uit de organisatie te vertalen  Je bent resultaatgericht en kan communiceren op alle niveaus binnen en buiten de organisatie  Je bent This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays  We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos  and Spotify   VP Product   Data  Adyen is looking for a passionate Product VP to massively scale our ability to convert data into value for our customers  Your teams will build and scale our core data generated by the massive volume from our financial services  Our merchants are the fastest growing companies in the world  and we need to stay ahead of their needs as their guide to manage highly regulated  highly sensitive data in a changing world  Your vision will enable every team at Adyen to run experiments  use data to solve problems worth millions  and ensure analytics are accessible and familiar to every Adyener from their first day  This role will be given considerable freedom to develop Adyen s data capabilities  including AI  core data infrastructure  data extraction  and rapid prototyping of datasets  You will create and evangelize a vision for products powered by Adyen s Big Data platform  realize that vision with multiple teams of product managers  designers  data scientists  and engineers  and ensure Adyen merchants gain measurable benefit from your teams  efforts  In this role you will  Listen to our merchants  engineers  and partners to find problems that Adyen is uniquely positioned to solve Become a known thought leader in the industry for financial technology and the use of data Long term strategic vision behind Data engineering Build vs  buy decisions  Open source scouting  External service big data   tooling providers Internal data enablement  Data engineering and architecture  Complexity vs  WIN  application of ML vs  next viable option  ML Scaling and tooling for cross company adoption What you need to succeed  Leadership   you have directly managed teams and you also have significant experience in scaling a data organization in a large  global company as management lead  Integrity   you have earned the trust of your technical and non technical customers and colleagues  from the board level to support level Proven record   you have conceived of launched and scaled multiple products in the big data   machine learning space with quantifiable value Data informed   you can guide data science engineering teams with the right questions to answer  and turn those answers into business value Business acumen   you have identified novel and significant revenue opportunities  and have convinced senior executives to invest in your product strategy Adaptability and creativity   plans and conditions always change  but you still positively navigate the right course Poise   sales asks you to sit with their clients  and marketing asks you to present at conferences  Network   you leverage your own network to hire  influence  validate  and get product adoption   Our Diversity  Equity   Inclusion Commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen   Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What is next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 7 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility

The job of a Channel Business Data Analyst   Working within the Financial Planning   Analysis team  FP A   you will provide the Business with key financial analysis for decision making  Under the direct supervision of a Commercial Analyst  you will support the FP A Team  Business Leaders and Departments with the information to evaluate operational performance and opportunities within the designated function s    Your role is key in processing  analyzing  and interpreting the data that we collect from our channel partners distributor network  Our partners are sharing Point Of Sales  POS  and Inventory data  which enables our business to make informed strategic decisions  you provide ad hoc analyses and support to the business  you proactively challenge results and seek opportunities to improve sales out   You produce custom made reports and dashboards by making use of BI tools and Excel  you will develop and demonstrate a strong business understanding  which is reflected in the reports  analysis  and commentaries provided  and assist the FP A Manager in managing the overall business highlighting opportunities for improvement  Additional responsibilities that come with this role   Continuously improve efficiency  quality and speed of cleaning  consolidating and reporting the data that we receive from our distributor network Follow up on performance and prepare daily weekly updates   Monitor KPIs in coordination with the business leaders   About the team  The FP A team is an international and diverse group of nine team players  All colleagues have their own specialties and focus areas but there is a lot of interaction and support to each other  We are dynamic and innovative  used to working with deadlines  but also find the time to have fun  Experience  Experience in cleaning and combining multiple data sources   Ability to meet tight deadlines  handle a demanding and fluctuating workload and at the same time provide accurate and reliable data   High level Excel skills  experience with Oracle and Hyperion would be a plus  Experience with Power Query  Power BI  and DAX is also considered to be a pre   A Bachelor s degree in Data Analytics and or Finance related studies or an equivalent of 1 3 years of experience as an analyst in an international  corporate  environment   Fluency in English  mastery of other  European  languages would be a plus   Personal skills  Thoroughness and attention to detail with steadiness under pressure  You are a team player who shows energy and persistence   Strong communication skills and the ability to combine your understanding of the financial process with persuasiveness and confidence   Development opportunities  We offer an environment in which you can  further  develop your skills in the area of Data Analytics and or Financial Planning  You can think of the following tasks that will help you gain knowledge and experience   Support with developing  testing  updating  and improving BI reports and dashboards  Support and drive the Business Teams in the preparation of the Annual Budget and Monthly Forecast  Analyze monthly results versus Monthly Forecast and Budget  find opportunities to improve Forecast Accuracy  Work together with the Commercial Analyst to prepare monthly forecast updates  analyze the impact of price adjustments  prepare margin analyses  Assist with testing  updating and improving BI reports and dashboards   Future prospects will become available for those that show drive  determination and ultimately achieve results  To make the application for a great cause in a growing organization  The organization currently counts 100 employees in Europe and the Dutch office is located in Leiden  but there is a lot of flexibility working from home  De functie You will be managing the database  registry  and ensure that data is accurate and reliable  The Registry is the heart and soul of the organization with novel data  receiving great interest from pharmaceutical companies  regulators and health technology assessment agencies  Currently they are migrating the data into a new system  A full job description is available  A summary of the responsibilities  Migrating data from the current database to the new database  From start to  go live   improvement projects   validations   migration   scripts   programming   trainings  Maintenance   development   testing   error correction   advising Training   organize and lead courses on the database  data managers   physicians and non specialized audience  Het profiel The ideal profile for the role as a Clinical Data Analyst  A background in statistics  IT  mathematics  health management or other relevant background  Experience working with clinical data  or complex databases  EDCs   Warehouses  Experience with migrating data between databases is a plus  SQL programming skills  Experience with Python is a big plus  Problem solving mindset  Fluent in English  Het aanbod You will be working in a great team with warm colleagues and a company with a strong goal  Besides the base salary you will receive a 13th month  holiday allowance  flexible hours  collective healh insurance and Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

job_desc: Word jij enthousiast van het analyseren van data en wil je bijdragen aan het verbeteren van industriële processen  Dan is deze functie misschien iets voor jou  Wij zoeken een  Data Scientist Waar ga je werken  Je gaat werken bij een industrieel automatiseringsbedrijf gevestigd in Groningen  Dit bedrijf is gespecialiseerd in de automatisering van een specifieke industriële omgeving  Je bent van de analyse van een product tot aan het opleveren van een werkbaar eindproduct betrokken bij het proces  Hierdoor zie je wat de resultaten van jouw analyses fysisch én fysiek opleveren voor het eindproduct  Het bedrijf verkoopt machines in combinatie met IT oplossingen die in bestaande fabricageprocessen kunnen worden toegepast  Het ontwerp en de bouw van de machines  hardware zijde  doet het bedrijf in samenwerking met andere partijen en deze taken worden  grotendeels  uitbesteed  De software die nodig is  beschouwt het bedrijf als zijn belangrijkste troef  Deze ontwikkelt het bedrijf zelf  Binnen het bedrijf werken ongeveer vijftig mensen waarvan het grootste deel zich bezighoudt met consulting  sales  installatie en het bieden van ondersteuning aan de klant bij het implementeren van systemen  Het overig deel  ongeveer 15 medewerkers  houdt zich voornamelijk bezig met code  het onderhouden en ontwikkelen van software waarmee het bedrijf zich weet te onderscheiden en zich marktleider mee mag noemen  Wat ga je doen  Je gaat data analyseren van producten die binnen verschillende onderdelen van een fabriek of productieproces worden gebruikt  Door de data van verschillende onderdelen te combineren analyseren  zorg je voor meer inzicht en kennis wat bij gaat dragen aan betrouwbare en gebruiksvriendelijke oplossingen om het proces zo goed mogelijk te laten verlopen  Samen met je collega s zet je deze data analyses in voor de ontwikkeling van nieuwe tools en user interfaces  Je komt te werken binnen een team met twee andere data scientists  een UX Job Description DATA SPECIALIST Brandbank   Benelux team   Houten OR Brussels office ABOUT THIS JOB Brandbank  a NielsenIQ company  is one of the world s largest providers of trusted digital product content for eCommerce sites  mobile shopping apps and virtual merchandising applications  With 20 years of experience in eCommerce content  Brandbank maximizes the impact of online products for the FMCG retailers and manufacturers  while minimizing the cost and effort to retailers and suppliers  We create high quality content that fuels eCommerce success for our customers while creating a rich online shopping experience  The BENELUX Data Specialist is the key subject matter expert for our day to day data operation  They apply their knowledge of how our data is captured  stored  transformed  and ultimately used  to resolve issues and drive improvements for our customers  The BENELUX Data Specialist is responsible for the management of the local data model  facilitating the implementation of non strategic business changes  including template creation  translation changes  code list updates  and associated processes  Working in alignment with our Business Development and Global Data teams  the Data Specialist will provide critical support for automation  innovation  and development across the BENELUX markets  RESPONSIBILITIES Management of local data model  including code list updates  and creation and maintenance of any supporting material Support template amendments  including translation and language support  Ownership of Operational relationship with standards organisations  GS1  in the market   working to ensure our relationship is aligned and proactive Actively maintain knowledge of the local GDSN data model and capture rules Delivery of GS1   Global Data Synchronization Network  GDSN  initiatives by supporting operational data capture changes Ensuring data quality is maintained through the transformation from the BrandBank Product Library  GDSN Connector and retailer sites Work with other data governance stakeholders to identify and enact changes to the data model and entry rules to drive quality and coverage of data and maximize the efficiency of the data entry process Involvement in scoping and design of new initiatives e g  dictionaries   validations Creation of  clean  data to drive logic building validations in systems Work with Data Hub team to deliver data analysis projects Coordinate roll out of local process changes to execution teams and providing relevant training material Provide support to customers  understanding their use cases for our data  working to resolve issues  and communicating the benefits of our data  syndication partners  retailers  etc   Management of New Fields  Translation changes and Lookup List changes Work with Legal Data Standards Manager to ensure compliance Work in alignment with Business Development team and PMO to deliver data automation projects Maintain a global view of the business s data strategy and goals  and work towards them REQUIREMENTS Degree level graduate or equivalent experience and knowledge of data processes Effective communicator  verbally and in writing Dutch language is a must  as well as English Good understanding of e commerce data space Passion for learning and keeping up to date with a fast changing area of the industry   ensuring up to date knowledge of eCommerce and Digital content WHAT WE CAN OFFER Work in dynamic environment with global companies from e commerce sector Possibility to grow together with the Brandbank team   NielsenIQ structure Opportunity to have great impact on expansion of the business  including new territories Work in high diverse team  in relax   open atmosphere Benefits   flexible working hours  remote work options Opportunity to become part of a global internal team of GDSN experts and to expand role outside the Benelux region Gradually become independent  a decision maker Interaction with a variety of internal and external stakeholders including clients and service providers Learn about physical and virtual photography and the distribution of digital assets  LI HL1 Additional Information About NielsenIQ NielsenIQ is a global measurement and data analytics company that provides the most complete and trusted view available of consumers and markets worldwide  We provide consumer packaged goods manufacturers fast moving consumer goods and retailers with accurate  actionable information and insights and a complete picture of the complex and changing marketplace that companies need to innovate and grow  Our approach marries proprietary NielsenIQ data with other data sources to help clients around the world understand what s happening now  what s happening next  and how to best act on this knowledge  We like to be in the middle of the action  That s why you can find us at work in over 90 countries  covering more than 90  of the world s population  For more information  visit www religion  gender  gender identity or expression  sexual orientation  national origin  genetics  disability status  age  marital status  protected veteran status or any other protected class

Vacatures Data Analyst   Platform P L management  EN  Financial analytical powerhouse dedicated to seize improvement opportunities Opleidingsniveau Bachelor Werkervaring 1 4   4 7 jaar locatie Utrecht Vacatures 4 000   5 500 Solliciteer direct Solliciteren Deel Esther Kuipers Recruiter Stel mij een vraag  Direct naar  How do you make our customers happy  Bol com is spearheading the network economy revolution  By now  over 48 000 partners do business on our platform  We make an effort to support our partners  ranging from startups to experienced e tailers  in a thousand different ways  The smarter they can do business  the happier our customers are  As Data Analyst Platform P L Management  you work on the cutting edge between finance and platform strategy  always within arm s reach of the commercial operation  Your in depth and innovative financial data insights help us to make better business decisions  Decisions that enable us to take our platform proposition to continuously higher levels for our partners and customers  Can you scrutinize raw financial data and translate  abstract  analytical insights into actionable business recommendations  Welcome aboard   What you do as Data Analyst   Platform P L Management Bol com is a full fledged retail tech platform that offers multiple  partner  propositions  Our partners can sell to an audience of millions  take advantage of attractive digital advertising options  in shopping   and trust on our  logistics as a service  solutions  such as  Logistiek via bol com  and  Verzenden via bol com   This necessitates commercial tradeoffs  How can we optimize our investment across these different propositions  What has the greatest return on investment  How can we use data insights to inform these decisions  And can you provide those data insights in a way that excites business stakeholders  Also  can you demonstrate that the right choices were made after the fact   In this role  you work closely with colleagues from business control and relevant business teams to help realize the strategic Platform agenda  You need to have a strong affinity for financial management  you are constantly deep diving into the financial data to discover new opportunities to improve the top and bottom lines in our P L statements  This often involves scrutinizing expenses and translating actionable insights into compelling improvement proposals  But those plans are just the beginning  Maximize your impact by converting your  wild  plans into quantifiable results  Again  in collaboration with the relevant business teams  And considering how many teams we have  the role also necessitates an ability  and drive  to work with constantly changing groups of colleagues   You discover innovative and in depth financial insights and translate these into actionable insights with Google BigQuery  SQL  and Google DataStudio   Tableau You translate raw financial data into a new commercial perspective and recommend POS  and Inventory data  which enables our business to make informed strategic decisions  you provide ad hoc analyses and support to the business  you proactively challenge results and seek opportunities to improve sales out   You produce custom made reports and dashboards by making use of BI tools and Excel  you will develop and demonstrate a strong business understanding  which is reflected in the reports  analysis  and commentaries provided  and assist the FP A Manager in managing the overall business highlighting opportunities for improvement  Additional responsibilities that come with this role   Continuously improve efficiency  quality and speed of cleaning  consolidating and reporting the data that we receive from our distributor network Follow up on performance and prepare daily weekly updates   Monitor KPIs in coordination with the business leaders   About the team  The FP A team is an international and diverse group of nine team players  All colleagues have languages would be a plus   Personal skills  Thoroughness and attention to detail with steadiness under pressure  You are a team player who shows energy and persistence   Strong communication skills and the ability to combine your understanding of the financial process with persuasiveness and confidence   Development opportunities  We offer an environment in which you can  further  develop your skills in the area of Data Analytics and or Financial Planning  You can think of the following tasks that will help you gain knowledge and experience   Support with developing  testing  updating  and ING is redefining banking  What about you  There has never been a more interesting time to work at ING  We at ING are pioneers  Our end goal is to unite ING and to achieve a single and best in class experience for all customers worldwide  We decided to build a leading European banking platform first  starting with two of our home markets  Belgium and the Netherlands  We re on a journey that s centred around our customers  powered by technology and driven by smart  determined people  Our customers feel our people are empowering them to stay a step ahead in life and in business  We re proud of that  ING is a bank where we value respect  trust  honesty and responsibility  Is sustainability  caring for others and thinking ahead all part of your DNA  Do you want to make a difference for our customers thanks to our agile way of working   see https   youtu be uXg6hG6FrG0   If so  this might well be the opportunity within ING you re looking for  Setting the standards for worldwide data governance ING is rapidly transforming from a traditional bank into a next generation digital bank  where everything revolves around data and smart data intelligence  The gathering  usage and governance of data is of the highest importance for a data driven culture   a cornerstone in our transformation  We are building a well governed data lake that ensures data availability  common understanding of business terms  data quality is measured and issues are remediated  data is traceable and controlled in line with regulations  an ambitious implementation based on leading technology  It is not only about data  we deliver trust  respect  commitment and reliability  People empowering people with qualitative data products  The Team You will be part of the Data Management tribe in the Netherlands  closely working together with the Belgium Data Management tribe  Together with data owners and data stewards in the organisation  we ensure that data is defined  can be easily exchanged  the data quality is monitored  and the data lake is set up according to security and privacy standards  We provide the data on need to know basis to important users like Finance  Risk  Investments  Mortgages  Analytics  ING Group and more  Our teams  squads  are located in The Netherlands and Romania  For our CDO Office squad  which supports our Chief Data Officer  we are looking for an enthusiastic Data Quality Officer with a passion for data  knowledge  and who has experience in data management  and will help us ensure that our data lake is optimally aligned with business requirements and terminology  Your key responsibilities Collaborate closely with business and IT stakeholders in order to gather their data governance requirements  to understand their data  their  meta  data needs and business context  Work on the data governance strategy and roadmap  aligned with the Chief Data Officer  Set requirements for data quality  data lineage and other relevant aspects for business terms and data assets  Initiate data management improvements  set data quality  data issue remediation guidelines and standards  Develop and implement data quality framework   policies and standards and monitor and control the data governance framework  policy and standards  Collaborate with the Metadata Modeler  Data Lineage   Data Definitions and Data Governance Officer in order to improve the current way of working  Guide and coach others in the field of data management  such as data stewards in the business domains  and encourages the organisation to become  data minded   Support CDO in the data councils  Define and report on indicators of performance and quality metrics Define long term meta data strategy and capabilities  We are looking for A colleague with a talent for taking it on and making it happen  enthusiasm for helping others to be successful and a knack for always being a step ahead  In other words  you strive to bring fresh ideas to life and embrace challenges in a fast changing and complex environment  You are a naturally collaborative person who listens and invests in others to achieve common goals  You love to challenge the status quo and are eager to propose creative solutions to problems  You have a passion for data  sense for accuracy and walk the talk  Furthermore  you should have  Deep knowledge of and expertise on data governance  quality frameworks  policies and standards Good understanding of business and technology issues related to management of information assets Knowledge of data management related regulatory requirements  such as GDPR  BCBS239  Broad knowledge and deep practical experience with data quality  data lineage  data security  data privacy  data life cycle management  data issue remediation and other data governance practices Knowledge and experience with  meta  data modelling techniques and the development of conceptual  logical and dimensional data models and the safeguarding of their interdependence Strong conceptual and analytical skill to make the right modelling choices Excellent communication skills  both verbally and in writing  to be able to align with various stakeholders Excellent command of English in word and writing to define business terms An enthusiastic personality and inclusive mindset A connection with the Agile way of working in multidisciplinary teams Experience in the Amsterdam About us Moove is a mobility fintech empowering mobility entrepreneurs by democratising vehicle ownership in emerging markets  We have operations in London  Amsterdam  Lagos  Accra  Joburg  Cape Town  Nairobi and Dubai  and are scaling our global footprint rapidly  Co founded in 2019 by Ladi Delano  a serial entrepreneur who has built businesses in Asia and Africa  and Jide Odunsi  a former senior Goldman Sachs banker and McKinsey alumnus  Moove has raised over  68m to date from some of the world s leading fintech VCs including Speedinvest and Left Lane Capital  and global lenders including the IFC  We are also Uber s exclusive fleet supply and financing partner in key emerging markets  About the role Building the fintech mobility platform of the future necessitates putting data at the heart of everything we do  To support this mission we are building a newly created Data function composed of Data Science  Engineering  Analytic and Governance subgroupings  Our Governance unit is seeking experienced and creative business analysts who want to use their skills to improve people s lives and help us democratize mobility through fintech  As the Data Governance Specialist  you will contribute to establishing common processes and procedures critical to data governance including data management  curating and extending the data taxonomy catalogue and quality scorecard  and communicating the strategic and operational progress of data management to data owners and the steward community  Your key responsibilities will be to  Partner with Security and Data Protection to identify  tag  and develop data management strategies for masking and protecting sensitive data within architecture  including driving the introduction of tools and processes to simplify identification and management Work with Program management and data governance councils to define data governance processes and explore automation to enable scaling  Ensure controls are in place for access and security Develop and deploy data governance framework standards consisting of data standards  processes and procedures in the areas of data ingestion  data movement  data quality  master   reference data  data life cycle management and metadata management Document sources of truth for data enabling consistent data sources  definitions  structures and processes  Work closely with Business owners to onboard critical data assets Create and conduct governance processes to measure Data Management and Data Quality maturity Establish relevant processes toward data integrity  user trust  and data access Document  assess  influence  and synthesize business requirements Understand the upstream and downstream data impact  Help implement enterprise data catalogue documenting data glossaries  taxonomy  metadata  usage  and lineage Establish KPIs for periodic measurement and reporting to the data governance councils Educate   drive adoption of data governance practices by showing its impact on business decision making Qualifications and experience Experience with enterprise data governance  content  compliance  and security programs Experience in creating policies  standards  and playbooks Strong Experience with SQL Ability to communicate effectively with technical and business teams  drive issues to closure Strong understanding of IT systems  metadata management  data management  and data stewardship Strong time management and organization skills Ability to drive multiple projects concurrently Experience in Master Data Management  data governance  data analysis  data profiling  data quality and system integration Experience working in Data catalogue  Data Lineage and Governance practices Bachelor s degree in Computer Science  MIS  Engineering or a related technical discipline preferred Moove is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of gender  race  sexual orientation  marital status  religion  political affiliation or any other protected characteristic  Our team is collaborative  positive  curious  and engaged  We think fast  work smart  laugh often  and are looking for like minded people to join us in our mission to disrupt vehicle ownership and make cities better

month rotational program  If you have a curious mind  a knack for problem solving and profound knowledge of machine learning methods  join our graduate program to kickstart your career  Your Benefits International work experience Building an international network Individual career coaching Targeted training As a Data Science Trainee you will For 18 months  work with international teams throughout Bertelsmann divisions worldwide Crack complex data challenges arising in our media  services and education businesses Add your knowledge and experience by designing new data products Learn from renowned data scientists and explore new use cases for Machine Learning and AI Leverage new data sources and integrate traditional structured data with raw data What you ll need to bring  Master s or methodologies and multi expertise  We are proud to say we re enjoying skyrocketing growth   Our broad range of data driven solutions are designed to meet our clients  specific needs  always conceived with a business centric approach and delivered with tangible results  We are action biased and act fast  Preferring POC s over PPT s   We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation  Thanks to a unique mix of company assets  State of the art data technologies  lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery  and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants  data analysts  data scientists  data engineers  and digital experts  all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client  And we love a challenge   What you will be doing  Key responsibilities  Your role will encompass   Building and growing the office  Acting as the primary sparring partner for the Managing Partner Creating real impact at clients  Transforming data into executives  CMOs  CDO  sometime directly the CEOs  into a transformation of their business and make sure Artefact is their preferred partner in this endeavor  Among your responsibilities as Director  you will    Develop the country Consulting Department Ensure the best allocation of consultants resources to clients and projects  staffing  Develop the consultants  expertise through training and portfolio through personal contacts  events  cold calls  etc  Monitor the commercial pipeline Build proposals supporting the client needs Strengthen our relationships with current clients Develop the consulting offer with existing clients  especially with Data   Digital Marketing or Data clients Develop our Global Knowledge platform Build stronghold of knowledge through your clients  engagements  frameworks  methodologies  technologies     Ensure the spread of the Consulting Department knowledge across the company at local and global level  in coordination with the Consulting Practice  What we are looking for  You have demonstrated success in your first 8  years of career at a tier 1 consulting firm and have 4  years of experience managing projects and or clients  DOER   you get things done yourself and inspire your teams to do so ANALYTIC   you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts HUNTER   you identify business opportunities and enjoy MOVER AND SHAKER   you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins MENTOR   your clients and teams naturally seek for advice AUTONOMOUS   you re an entrepreneur  Why you should join us  Artefact is the place be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs  We won t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry
